<p class="smalltext"><em>A substantial penalty is imposed for early withdrawal on certificates.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext"><em>* APY = Annual Percentage Yield. Annual Percentage Yield is based on the assumption that the account will be rolled over at maturity for the same term and remain on deposit for one year. The existing interest rate may not be available at maturity.
APY is earned only if interest remains in account. A withdrawal of the interest earned will reduce future earnings.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext"><em>Minimum deposit is required to open the account. Fees or other conditions could reduce the earnings on the accounts shown above. Interest is not earned if the account balance falls below $10.00.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext">**The 2.25% APY CD is for a term of 15 months.  $500.00 minimum deposit is required to open  account.   APY assumes interest will stay on deposit until maturity.  You must maintain $10 in the account to obtain the disclosed  APY.  A withdrawal of the interest earned will reduce future earnings. A penalty is imposed for early withdrawal on certificates.  Fees or other conditions could reduce the earnings.   </p>
<p class="smalltext"><em><strong>PLEASE NOTE:&nbsp;</strong>Interest rates and programs are subject to change, please call your local representative for updated interest rates and program information.</em></p>

http://www.mysbank.com/personal/checking/rewards-checking.html, #productTabs, <dl id="productTabs" style="height: 1673px;" class="ae-tabset"><dt class="tabSummary label selected ae-label ae-tabset-tab ae-tabset-activetab" role="button" aria-expanded="true" tabindex="0" aria-controls="ae_mel_panel_0" id="ae_mel_tab_0">Summary</dt><dd data-name="tabSummary" data-bv="" class="pane ae-tabset-content" style="position: absolute;" id="ae_mel_panel_0" aria-labelledby="ae_mel_tab_0"><div class="tabDiv"><p><span>Simplify your banking experience and get rewarded for doing it! Earn really high interest and nationwide ATM fee refunds*  just for doing things you're probably already doing, like using your debit card and banking online.</span></p><p><span>And there are no balance requirements or per-check charges with this free e-checking account. It truly is money management made easy.</span></p><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Details:		</h3><ul><li><span>Free checking account with interest plus rewards</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>1.06% APY* on balances up to $25,000.99</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>1.06% to 0.05% APY* on balances $25,001.00 and over</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>0.01% APY* if qualifications are not met</span></li><li><span>Rates are variable and are subject to change</span></li><li><span>Nationwide ATM fee refunds (up to $25 each month)*</span></li><li><span>No minimum balance to maintain</span></li><li><span>Unlimited checking</span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/personalized-debit-cards.html">Debit card</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/online-banking-bill-pay.html">Online banking with bill pay</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/mobile-banking.html">Mobile banking</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/go-green-estatements.html">eStatements</a></span></li><li><span>Telephone banking</span></li><li><span>$250 minimum deposit to open</span></li></ul><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Qualifications:</h3><p><span>Earning the rewards rate and ATM fee refunds is so easy! To earn your rewards, simply do the following activities in your Rewards Checking account during the monthly qualification cycle.</span></p><ul><li><span>10 debit card POS (point of sale) transactions post and settle per qualification cycle</span></li><li><span>Have at least one Direct Deposit or ACH Auto Debit post and settle per qualification cycle</span></li><li><span>Be enrolled and receive<span><a href="/personal/services/go-green-estatements.html"> eStatement</a></span> notice</span></li><li><span>Be enrolled and log into online banking</span></li></ul><p><span>If you should miss the rewards one month, don't worry. You still get a checking account that earns the base rate of 0.01% APY*. And you can get the rewards back the very next month you qualify!</span></p><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Upgrade to Real Rewards Saver</h3><p><span>You can make even more with your money. <span><a href="/personal/checking/realrewards-with-saver.html">Real Rewards with Saver</a></span> maximizes your earnings with a linked savings account that offers you a second great interest rate.</span></p><br><p><span>Open your accounts online today  or at any of our locations in Midland, Odessa, San Antonio, Big Lake, McCamey, Crane, Monahans, or Devine.</span></p><div class="productDisclaimer"><p class="disclaimer"><span>*Minimum deposit to open account is $250.  Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 10/1/2018. Rate tiers are as follows: 1.06% APY applies to balances of $.01 - $25,000.99, and 1.06% APY  0.05% APY applies to balances of $25,001.00 and over if qualifications are met during the monthly qualification cycle.  0.01% APY applies to all balances if monthly qualifications are not met.  Rates may change after the account is opened.  Fees may reduce earnings.Qualifying transactions must post and settle the account during the monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more business days from the transaction date to post to an account from the date the transaction is made. Intra-bank transfers do not count as qualifying ACH transactions. Rewards Checking is available to personal accounts and is limited to one account per social security number.The "statement cycle" is the first business day of the month through the last business day of the month.  The "qualification cycle" is the period beginning one business day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one business day prior to the close of the current statement cycle.  Therefore, the above mentioned minimum activity will be determined based upon transactions posted and settled one day prior to the last business day of the month.  Transactions posted and settled on the last business day of the month will be counted toward minimum activity for the following qualification cycle. ATM Fee reimbursements up to $25/$5 per occurrence provided only if qualifications are met within the monthly qualification cycle.  The ATM refunds will be credited to your account on the last day of the statement cycle. ATM processed transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card transactions.</span></p></div></div></dd></dl>

    Open Online</a></div><div id="currentCustomer1" class="text-popup mfp-hide"><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Do you currently have an account with Security Bank?</h3><div><a href="/applications/application.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=shortApplication" class="primary-button" target="_parent">Yes</a><a href="/applications/open-an-account.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=application" class="primary-button" target="_parent">No</a></div>
</div><div class="page-tabs accordion"><div class="accordion-title details active ae-active" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0">Details</div><div class="accordion-content details" style="display: block; overflow: hidden;"><p></p>
<ul>
<li>Free checking that pays high interest</li>
<li>
<p>2.50% (2.53% APY*) on balances up to and including $50,000</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>0.30% (2.53% to 0.30% APY* range) on balances over $50,000</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>0.10% APY* paid even if qualifications aren't met</p>
</li>
<li>Refunds on ATM withdrawal fees, nationwide (up to $25 monthly)*</li>
<li>No minimum balance to earn rewards</li>
<li>No monthly maintenance fees</li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/online-banking-bill-pay.html">online banking &amp; bill pay</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/mobile-banking-mobile-deposit.html">mobile banking with mobile deposit</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/estatements.html">e-Statements</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/personal/visa-debit-card.html">Visa debit card</a></li>
<li>$100 minimum deposit to open</li>
</ul>
<h3>Earning Your Rewards is Simple.</h3>
<p>To bring home your full rewards, enrollments must be in place and all of the following transactions and activities must post and settle to your Security Bonus Checking account during each Monthly Qualification Cycle:</p>
<ul>
<li>At least 1 direct deposit, ACH credit, or ACH payment transaction</li>
<li>At least 10 debit card purchases of $3.00 or more</li>
<li>Be enrolled in and review e-Statements</li>
</ul>
<p>Easy. In fact, these qualifications were designed to make your banking experience even easier. And don't worry if you miss one month. You'll still earn our base interest rate, and you can earn your rewards in full the very next cycle!</p></div></div><div class="secondary-cta"><div class="primary-button"><a href="#currentCustomer1" class="currentCustomerPopup">
          
    Open Online</a></div><div id="currentCustomer1" class="text-popup mfp-hide"><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Do you currently have an account with Security Bank?</h3><div><a href="/applications/application.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=shortApplication" class="primary-button" target="_parent">Yes</a><a href="/applications/open-an-account.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=application" class="primary-button" target="_parent">No</a></div>
</div></div><div class="disclaimer"><p>*APY=Annual Percentage Yield. APYs accurate as of 11/1/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. Minimum to open is $100. If qualifications are met each monthly qualification cycle: (1)Domestic ATM fees incurred during qualification cycle will be reimbursed up to $25 and credited to account on the last day of monthly statement cycle; (2)balances up to and including $50,000 receive APY of 2.53%; and (3)balances over $50,000 earn 0.30% interest rate on portion of balance over $50,000, resulting in a range of 2.53% to 0.30% APY depending on the balance. If qualifications are not met, all balances earn 0.10% APY. Qualifying transactions must post to and settle account during monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date transaction was made to post to and settle an account. Transfers between accounts do not count as qualifying transactions. ATM-processed transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card transactions. "Monthly Qualification Cycle" means a period beginning&nbsp;two business days prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through&nbsp;two business days&nbsp;prior to the close of the current statement cycle. Fees may reduce earnings. Limit two accounts per household.</p></div></div>

    <p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">Minimum balances to earn APY are as follows: Certificates and IRA Certificates, $500; Future Builder Certificates, $250; Jumbo Share Certificates, $25,000. Penalty for early withdrawal.</span></p>

    <li><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">Certificates are Share Certificates.</span></li>
</ol>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers"> This Security Service Federal Credit Union Current Dividend Rates disclosure is incorporated as a part of and in addition to the <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/deposittc.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=83F0FCF5BAF4BF30C85E4DCEBC3BA1734CFFB20A" target="_blank">All About Your Security Service Accounts</a> brochure, the Security Service <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/truthinsavings.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=2318A6D776A7C96FB2F7A7FF3702A4BCEBDAEFA4" target="_blank">Truth in Savings</a> brochure, and the <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/consumer-fee-schedule.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=0106D6B2C56CD4F8AF1433EAD914EDD07DB3EA70" target="_blank">Security Service Fee Schedule for Consumer Deposit Accounts</a>. Please refer to these items for additional terms, conditions and limitations which may be associated with your specific account(s).</span></p>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers"><br>
</span></p>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers"> APY = Annual Percentage Yield. APY is accurate as of 11/16/18. The Dividend Rate and APY may change without notice at the discretion of the Security Service Federal Credit Union Board of Directors. Fees may reduce earnings on your account. Contact an employee for further information or to obtain current rate information at 1.888.415.7878.</span></p>

    <script>
        function ToggleSlideshow()
        {
            $('#DivSlideshowContainer').data('galleria').playToggle();
            console.log("slideshow toggled");
        }

        function ShowPause()
        {
            $('#ToggleLink').text('Click or Tap to Play Slideshow - or press space bar')
        }

        function ShowPlay()
        {
            $('#ToggleLink').text('Click or Tap to Pause Slideshow- or press space bar')
        }

        $(window).keypress(function (e)
        {
            if (e.keyCode === 0 || e.keyCode === 32) {
                e.preventDefault()
                ToggleSlideshow();
            }
        })
    </script>

http://www.simsburybank.com/personal-banking/resources-tools/rates-and-fees/, #main > div.content, <div class="content">
		<div class="open-account">
		<h3>Open an account!</h3>
<p><a class="btn internal external" href="https://forms.fivision.com/simsburybank/oa/default.aspx" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">get started</a></p>
	</div><!-- /.open-account -->
<h2>Rates and Fees</h2>
<h3>Understanding product rates and fees.</h3>
<p>Please take the time to review the rates and fees associated with our products. If you have any questions or concerns, we encourage you to call or visit your local branch.</p>
<h5>Deposit Rates</h5>
<p>Download the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.simsburybank.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Dep-Rates-05-24-18-Updated-Format.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="local">current rates</a>&nbsp;(pdf).</p>
<h5>Loan Rates</h5>
<p>Download the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.simsburybank.com/download-todays-rates/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="local">current loan rates</a> (pdf).</p>
<h5>Fees &amp; Charges</h5>
<p>Fees below effective <strong>February 1, 2018</strong>.</p>
	<div class="accordion">
					<div class="accordion-section accordion-expanded">

					<div class="accordion-section">
				<div class="accordion-head">
					<h4>Personal Account Maintenance Fees</h4>
				</div><!-- /.accordion-head -->
				
				<div class="accordion-body" style="">
					<h5>Pinnacle+ Advantage Checking<sup>1</sup></h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$25,000 combined minimum daily&nbsp;balance in checking, savings, money markets, CDs, retirement accounts, HSAs and outstanding consumer loans to waive $20/month service charge. This does not include passbook savings accounts.</li>
</ul>
<h5>Earning Advantage</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$1,000 minimum daily balance or a combined minimum daily&nbsp;balance of $5,000 in this and Savings or CD account to waive $12/month service charge. This does not include passbook savings accounts.</li>
</ul>
<h5>Everyday Advantage</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$1,000 minimum daily balance or a combined minimum daily&nbsp;balance of $2,500 in this and Savings or CD account to waive $10/month service charge. This does not include passbook savings accounts.</li>
</ul>
<h5>eAdvantage</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>No monthly service charge or minimum daily&nbsp;balance requirement</li>
</ul>
<p><em>Other charges:</em></p>
<ul>
<li>Official Checks  $8.00</li>
<li>Teller withdrawal or split transaction  $1.00</li>
<li>Branch generated statement  $4.00</li>
<li>Each check used  $0.50</li>
</ul>
<h5>65+ Advantage</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$500 minimum daily balance or a combined minimum daily&nbsp;balance of $2,500 in this and Savings or CD account to waive $3/month service charge. This does not include passbook savings accounts.</li>
</ul>
<h5>Health Savings Account Checking (HSAs)</h5>
<p><em>Tiered Rate Checking Account</em></p>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$2,500 minimum daily balance to waive service charge</li>
<li>Service charge of $3 (waived for first two years)</li>
<li>$10 enrollment fee (waived if employer referral to SBT)</li>
</ul>
<p><em>High Yield CD</em></p>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$500 minimum balance</li>
<li>No annual or monthly fee when linked with HSA Tiered Checking</li>
<li>$20/year if no HSA Tiered Checking (for those no longer eligible to make contributions)</li>
</ul>
<h5>Statement &amp; Passbook Savings</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$300 minimum daily&nbsp;balance to waive $4/month service charge</li>
</ul>
<h5>Money Market Savings</h5>
<ul>
<li>$25 minimum balance to open</li>
<li>$2,500 minimum daily&nbsp;balance to waive $10/month service charge</li>
</ul>
<h5>Certificates of Deposit</h5>
<p>$500 minimum balance<sup>2</sup> to open</p>
<h5>Retirement Accounts</h5>
<p>$500 minimum balance<sup>2</sup> to open</p>
<p class="disclaimer"><sup>1</sup>Refer to Pinnacle Brochure for program details.</p>
<p class="disclaimer"><sup>2</sup>Penalties for early withdrawal. See account disclosure for more details.</p>

http://www.smartypig.com/, #node-49 > div > div > div > div, <div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p class="disclosure" style="margin-top: 0px;">SmartyPig Accounts are offered through Sallie Mae Bank, Member FDIC.</p>

<p class="disclosure" style="margin-top: 10px;"><sup>1</sup> Advertised Interest Rates and Annual Percentage Yields (APY) for the SmartyPig Account are variable and may change after account opening, are based on your account balance, apply to personal accounts only, and are accurate as of 10/5/2018. The ongoing APYs and Interest Rates associated with different account balances are: If your daily balance is more than $0 but $2,500 or less the interest rate paid on the entire balance in your account will be 1.73% with an annual percentage yield of 1.75%. If your daily balance is more than $2,500 but $10,000 or less the interest rate paid on the entire balance in your account will be 1.73% with an annual percentage yield of 1.75%. If your daily balance is more than $10,000 but $50,000 or less the interest rate paid on the entire balance in your account will be 1.73% with an annual percentage yield of 1.75%. If your daily balance is more than $50,000 the interest rate paid on the entire balance in your account will be 1.73% with an annual percentage yield of 1.75%. Please refer to the SmartyPig Account <a href="https://www.smartypig.com/terms-and-conditions" target="_blank">Terms and Conditions Agreement</a> for details.</p>

                <h1 class="h1style">Current Rates</h1>
                <div class="medSpace">&nbsp;</div>

<div class="htmlModuleWrap">
    <p class="h3style"><strong>FOR THE WEEK OF: </strong></p>

<p class="h3style"><strong>Nov. 19, 2018 - Nov. 25, 2018</strong></p>

fancybox.iframe">Questions</a></li></ul><div class="productSummary"><p><strong>High Interest Checking Special: </strong>You can tell a lot by a name, but not everything. New Solvay Bank checking account customers qualify for our high interest checking account special that could earn up to 4.00% APY* on balances up to $15.000 for 12 months from account opening if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met.&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>High Interest Checking:</strong> Our current Solvay Bank checking account customers can earn up to 2.00% APY* on balances up to $15,000 if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met.</p>
<p>All High Interest Checking customers can earn ATM fee refunds  not just in Syracuse or Central New York, but nationwide! All with no minimum balance requirement.</p>
<p>Earning a high rate is so easy, you're probably already doing it. Check out the 3 simple qualifications and get ready for an account that actually pays you money, not the other way around.</p></div><!-- rates and calc links --><div class="five columns alpha"><div class="tertiaryButtonsContainer"><ul class="tertiaryButtons"><li><a href="/home/rates/checking-account-rates.html#high-interest-checking*" class="rateslink">View Our Rates <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li><li><a href="/tools/calculators/reward-checking.html?questions=false&amp;learnmore=false" class="calclink calcPopup fancybox fancybox.iframe calc">Calculator <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li></ul></div></div><div class="seven columns omega"><div class="productButtonContainer"><div class="primaryButton"><a href="/applications/open-an-account.html?productInode=77858b33-2a2a-4446-89cf-049f0d5271b3&amp;dynamicFormType=application"> <span class="ae-compliance-indent ae-reader-visible" style="display:none;"> Checking /High Interest Checking, </span> 
        Open in Minutes
      </a></div></div></div></div><div id="productDetails" class="tabsAccordion"><dl id="productTabs" class="noMobile"><dt class="tab-summary selected" role="heading" aria-level="2">Summary</dt><dd style="display: block;"><ul>
<li><strong>High </strong><strong>Interest Checking Special:</strong> 4.00% APY* for new Solvay Bank checking account customers on balances up to $15,000 for 12 months from account opening if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met</li>
<li><strong>High Interest Checking:</strong> 2.00% APY* for current checking account customers on balances up to $15,000 if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Benefits for all High Interest Checking Customers</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Earn refunds on ATM fees nationwide**</li>
<li>No minimum balance to earn rewards</li>
<li>No monthly service fee if direct deposit is maintained***</li>
<li>Free online banking &amp; bill pay****</li>
<li>Mobile Banking available</li>
<li>Free E-Statements</li>
<li>Free Visa debit card</li>
<li>Unlimited check writing</li>
<li>$15 minimum deposit to open</li>
<li>Special loan discounts on Mortgages, Home Equity &amp; Installment Loans (See our rates page for details)</li>
</ul>
<h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Qualifications for all High Interest Checking Customers&nbsp;</h3>
<p>To earn your rewards, just do the following transactions and activities in your account during each monthly statement cycle:</p>
<ul>
<li>Be enrolled in and agree to receive E-Statements</li>
<li>Have at least one direct deposit/ACH credit post and settle</li>
<li>Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and settle. </li>
</ul>
<p>See. Unbelievably simple. And even if you don't qualify one cycle, you still have a&nbsp;checking account that earns our base rate.</p></dd></dl><dl id="productTabsMobile" class="mobile ae-exclude"><dt class="tab-summary selected">Summary</dt><dd style="display: block;"><ul>
<li><strong>High </strong><strong>Interest Checking Special:</strong> 4.00% APY* for new Solvay Bank checking account customers on balances up to $15,000 for 12 months from account opening if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met</li>
<li><strong>High Interest Checking:</strong> 2.00% APY* for current checking account customers on balances up to $15,000 if account qualifications &amp; rate tiers are met</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Benefits for all High Interest Checking Customers</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Earn refunds on ATM fees nationwide**</li>
<li>No minimum balance to earn rewards</li>
<li>No monthly service fee if direct deposit is maintained***</li>
<li>Free online banking &amp; bill pay****</li>
<li>Mobile Banking available</li>
<li>Free E-Statements</li>
<li>Free Visa debit card</li>
<li>Unlimited check writing</li>
<li>$15 minimum deposit to open</li>
<li>Special loan discounts on Mortgages, Home Equity &amp; Installment Loans (See our rates page for details)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Qualifications for all High Interest Checking Customers&nbsp;</h3>
<p>To earn your rewards, just do the following transactions and activities in your account during each monthly statement cycle:</p>
<ul>
<li>Be enrolled in and agree to receive E-Statements</li>
<li>Have at least one direct deposit/ACH credit post and settle</li>
<li>Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and settle. </li>
</ul>
<p>See. Unbelievably simple. And even if you don't qualify one cycle, you still have a&nbsp;checking account that earns our base rate.</p></dd></dl><div id="productDisclaimer" class="disclaimer"><p>*Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is accurate as of 8/1/2018. 4.00% APY on balances up to $15,000 for 12 months from account opening if account qualifications and rate tiers are met is available to new checking account customers of Solvay Bank. Current checking account customers or those who have closed a checking account within the last 90 days are not eligible for this offer. The APY for current checking account customers or those who have closed an account in the last 90 days is 2.00% APY on balances up to $15,000 if account qualifications and rate tiers are met. Limit one new checking account per tax ID. Account holder must meet the following qualifications each statement cycle to earn rate and ATM refunds: (1) post and clear 12 debit card purchases; (2) post one electronic direct deposit; (3) receive eStatements. At least one electronic direct deposit of salary, pension, or government benefits is required each statement cycle to avoid a $5 monthly maintenance fee. New accounts are subject to bank account opening requirements and applicants must be residents of Cayuga, Cortland, Madison, Oneida, Onondaga and Oswego counties within New York State. </p>
<p><strong>High Interest Checking Special:</strong> If your daily balance is $15,000 or less, the interest rate will be 3.93% with an APY of 4.00%. An interest rate of 0.10% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is greater than $15,000. The APY for this tier will range from 0.10% to 4.00% depending on the balance in the account. If monthly qualifications are not met, the rate will be 0.05% with a 0.05% APY on all balances. Rate may change after promotional period. </p>
<p><strong>High Interest Checking:</strong> If your daily balance is $15,000 or less, the interest rate will be 1.98% with an APY of 2.00%. An interest rate of 0.10% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is greater than $15,000. The APY for this tier will range from 0.10% to 2.00% depending on the balance in the account. If monthly qualifications are not met, the rate will be 0.05% with a 0.05% APY on all balances. Rate is subject to change after account opening.<br>Minimum deposit is $15. Fees may reduce earnings. Promotion may end without notice. <br>New accounts are subject to bank account opening requirements and applicants must be residents of Cayuga, Cortland, Madison, Oneida, Onondaga and Oswego counties within New York State. <br>Qualifying transactions must post and clear to the account during the monthly statement cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date the transaction was made to post to an account. Intra-bank transfers &amp; ATM transactions do not count as qualifying transactions.<br>**ATM Fee reimbursements up to $25 provided only if qualifications are met within the monthly statement cycle. <br>***At least one electronic deposit of salary, pensions, or government benefits from an employer or the government is required each statement cycle to avoid a $5.00 monthly maintenance fee.<br>**** Third party internet/data fees may apply.</p>
<p></p></div><div class="bottomButton"><h2>Ready to get started?         Open in Minutes

<p>*Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 4/23/18. 1.00% APY applies only to new money for 12 months from account opening date if rate tiers are met. Current savings or money market account holders or those who have closed an account within the last 90 days are not eligible for this offer.&nbsp; Limit one new savings account per tax ID.&nbsp; Rate may change after promotional period. If your daily balance is $250,000 or less, the interest rate will be 0.99% with an APY of 1.00%. An interest rate of 0.03% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is greater than $250,000. The APY for this tier will range from 0.03% to 1.00% depending on the balance in the account. Minimum deposit is $1. <p>*Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 4/23/18. 2.25% APY applies only to new account holders that deposit new money and establish a new High Interest, Emerald, or Direct Rewards checking account relationship with a $500 direct deposit each statement cycle. Current checking account holders or those who have closed an account within the last 90 days are not eligible for this offer. Limit one new account per tax ID. Rate is guaranteed for 12 months from account opening date if account qualifications and rate tiers are met. Rate may change after promotional period. If your daily balance is $250,000 or less, the interest rate will be 2.22% with an APY of 2.25%. The APY for this tier will range from 0.10% to 2.25% depending on the balance in the account. If a monthly direct deposit is not received in a High Interest, Emerald, or Direct Rewards checking account, the rate for this account will be 0.10% with a 0.10% APY on all balances. Minimum deposit is $2,500. A $2,500 average daily balance is required to avoid a $5 monthly maintenance fee and a $0.15 transaction fee. Fees may reduce earnings. Promotion may end without notice.                                                             <td class="td1" style="text-align:left">5 Year</td>
                                                            <td class="td2" style="text-align:center">$500.00</td>
                                                            <td class="td3" style="text-align:center">2.75%</td>
                                                        </tr>
                                                    </tbody>
                        </table>
                                                            <hr class="mt0">
                    <p style="float: right; padding-left: 20px;"><a href="https://www.southeastfinancial.org/resources/application-center" class="alt button">Open an Account</a>
</p><p class="fineprint"><strong>Rates Effective 11/01/2018<br></strong>*APY=Annual Percentage Yield <br> **IRAs not eligible</p><p class="fineprint"><strong>Early Withdrawal Penalties - <br></strong>The penalty we may impose for withdrawals before maturity will be the lesser of the following.<br>1. For all certificate terms that are less than six (6) months, the penalty will be all dividends posted to the account.<br>2. For all certificate terms that are six (6) months or greater, the penalty will be six (6) months of dividends
</p><p class="fineprint">The penalty is not to exceed the actual dividends posted and any insufficient amount of dividends will not be collected from principal. In certain circumstances, such as the death or incompetence of an owner of this account, the law permits, or in some cases requires, the waiver of the early withdrawal penalty. See your plan disclosure if this account is part of an IRA or other tax qualified plan. You will have a grace period of seven calendar days after maturity to withdraw the funds without being charged an early withdrawal penalty. Fees may reduce the earnings on an account. See the <a href="https://www.southeastfinancial.org/docs/forms/072417_Schedule-of-Products-and-Fees.pdf">Schedule of Products and Fees</a> for details.
</p>

							<h1 style="text-align: center;">&nbsp;<span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 24px;"><span style="color: #009366;">Free</span> Checking That <span style="color: #009366;">Pays</span> You High Dividends and <span style="color: #009366;">Refunds</span> on ATM Withdrawal Fees, Nationwide*</span></h1>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px;">Free Checking is nice, but, we think free is how checking should be.&nbsp; Free checking that pays you?&nbsp; Now thats something really special.&nbsp; </span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 24px;">Thats <strong><span style="color: #009366;">Kasasa Cash<sup></sup></span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px;">Some interest-bearing accounts reserve the better rates for the bigger balances.&nbsp; We flipped the script on that.&nbsp; Earn 3.00% APY* on balances up to $10,000! But thats not all.&nbsp; Well pay you refunds on ATM withdrawal fees all across the country!*&nbsp; So, stop paying for your money  <strong><span style="color: #009366;">let us pay you instead</span></strong>.&nbsp; </span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px;">Check out the chart below to decide which account to open today!</span></p>

<h2><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Earn high interest.*</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">When you meet your accounts qualifications during a Monthly Qualification Cycle, youll receive:</span></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: square;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">3.00% APY on all balances up to and including $10,000 and</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">0.25% APY on balances over $10,000, depending on balance in account</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">When qualifications are not met, you still earn 0.05% APY on the entire balance</span></p>
</td>
<td style="border-style: outset; border-color: #003976; width: 50%; height: 224px;">
<h2><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Earn cash back**</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">When you meet your accounts qualifications during a Monthly Qualification Cycle, youll receive:</span></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: square;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">3.00% cash back on debit card purchases, up to $300.00 in total purchases</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">Up to $9.00 total cash back per monthly qualification cycle</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">When qualifications are not met, cash back payments are not made</span></p>
</td>

<h2><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><a href="https://www.senb.com/personal-checking-kasasa/k2/" rel="attachment wp-att-2286"><img class="size-full wp-image-2286 alignright" src="https://www.senb.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/k2.jpg" alt="" width="119" height="128"></a>Qualifying for rewards is easy.</span></h2>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 16px;">Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and settle</span></li>

</ul>

<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://www.senb.com/about/locations-hours"><strong>Current Rewards customers wishing to upgrade to <span style="color: #009366;">Kasasa</span>, please contact your local Banking Center</strong></a></p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="https://www.senb.com?external=https%3A%2F%2Fumnasg23.umonitor.com%2Fuopen%2Fwelcome.do%3Fauth%3D86569d0b67b4b953"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-5675 size-full" src="https://www.senb.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Kasasa-Open-Now-5-2-18.jpg" alt="Open a Kasasa account now." width="202" height="100"></a></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #f0bd37;"><a target="_blank" class="blueBtn" href="https://www.senb.com?external=https%3A%2F%2Fumnasg23.umonitor.com%2Fuopen%2Fapplogin.do%3Fauth%3D86569d0b67b4b953">Continue Application</a></span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>We make banking <span style="color: #009366;">easy</span>! </strong>All accounts have access to <strong><span style="color: #009366;">FREE</span></strong> Online Banking, <strong><span style="color: #009366;">FREE</span></strong> Online Bill Pay, <span style="color: #009366;"><strong>FREE</strong> </span>Mobile Banking**, eStatements, Visa Debit Cards, Safe Deposit Boxes, Telephone Banking, Gift and Travel Cards, and thousands of convenient ATMs. <a href="https://www.senb.com/about/contact-us/">Learn more</a>!</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 10px; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">*Interest Rates and APY When the KASASA CASH Checking qualifications are not met, the interest rate on your account will be 0.05% and the annual percentage yield will be 0.05%. When the KASASA CASH Checking qualifications are met, the interest rate on your account and corresponding annual percentage yield will be tired. If your daily balance is $10,000.00 or less, the interest rate paid on the entire balance will be 2.96% with an annual percentage yield of 3.00%. An interest rate of 0.249% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is greater than $10,000.01. The annual percentage yield for this tier will range from 3.00% to 0.25% depending on the balance in the account. Interest begins to accrue on the business day you deposit noncash items (for example, checks). Rates as of 01/03/2017. Qualifications To qualify for KASASA CASH rates and receive reimbursements on your ATM fee surcharges, you must perform the following during the monthly qualification cycle: Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and clear Have at least 1 ACH transaction or direct deposit post and clear Receive eStatements Please note that transactions MUST post and clear to your account during the monthly qualification cycle. They may not be in a pending state to qualify as one of the qualifications. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date the transaction was made to post and clear an account. The following transactions do not count toward account rewards: ATM-processed transactions, transfers between accounts, non-retail transactions, and purchases made with debit cards not issued by our bank. Transactions bundled together by merchants and received by our institution as a single transaction count as a single transaction for the purpose of earning account rewards If you have met your qualifications for the specified qualification cycle, we will reimburse you for all domestic ATM fees. ATM fee reimbursements will be credited to your account on the last day of your statement cycle. When you use an ATM not owned by us, you may be charged a fee by the ATM operator or network. You may be charged a fee for a balance inquiry even if you do not complete a fund transfer or withdrawal. If you meet the monthly qualifications for KASASA CASH Checking, those ATM fees will be reimbursed. If an individual ATM fee is $5.00 or higher, you must contact us for reimbursement within sixty (60) calendar days of the withdrawal transaction, you must also have your receipt. ATM fee reimbursement will be credited to your KASASA CASH Checking account on the last day of the current statement cycle. When KASASA CASH checking qualifications are not met, no ATM fees will be refunded. Monthly Qualification Cycle and Monthly Statement Cycle Explanation Monthly Qualification Cycle means a period beginning one banking day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one banking day prior to the close of the current statement cycle. Your account will be automatically qualified on that one day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle. What this means for you is if you did not qualify for the higher preferred rate, you might notice a slightly higher than the base rate APY earned on your statement due to the one day (the last day) being calculated with the higher preferred rate. The qualification cycle is the 21st of the month through the 20th of the next month. The qualification cycle may end earlier if the 20th falls on a weekend or holiday. Other Account Information SENB reserves the right to limit the number of accounts to two (2) accounts per social security number. Rates and rewards are variable and may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings. If you choose not to have electronic delivery of eStatements, your account will be converted to SENB Essential after three (3) monthly qualification cycles. Other Contract Terms To receive your monthly statement electronically, the following minimum computer hardware and software requirements must be met: One of the following operating systems: Windows XP, 2000 or Macintosh OSX. A secure session is established by using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption and a compatible browser, such as; Internet Explorer 7.0, Netscape 7.2, Mozilla Firefox 1.0 or Safari 1.2.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 10px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">**When the KASASA CASH BACK Checking qualifications are met during a Monthly Qualification Cycle, you will receive 3.00% cash back on up to a total of $300 in debit card purchases that post and settle to the account during that qualification cycle period. A maximum of $9.00 cash back may be earned per Monthly Qualification Cycle. KASASA CASH BACK Checking payments will be credited to your KASASA CASH BACK account on the last day of the current statement cycle. When KASASA CASH BACK qualifications are not met, no cash back payments are made. Qualifications To qualify for KASASA CASH BACK and receive cash back reimbursements on your ATM fee surcharges, you must perform the following during the monthly qualification cycle: Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and clear Have at least 1 ACH transaction or direct deposit post and clear Receive eStatements Please note that transactions MUST post and clear to your account during the monthly qualification cycle. They may not be in a pending state to qualify as one of the qualifications. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date the transaction was made to post and clear an account. The following transactions do not count toward account rewards: ATM-processed transactions, transfers between accounts, non-retail transactions, and purchases made with debit cards not issued by our bank. Transactions bundled together by merchants and received by our institution as a single transaction count as a single transaction for the purpose of earning account rewards If you have met your qualifications for the specified qualification cycle, we will reimburse you for all domestic ATM fees. ATM fee reimbursements will be credited to your account on the last day of your statement cycle. When you use an ATM not owned by us, you may be charged a fee by the ATM operator or network. You may be charged a fee for a balance inquiry even if you do not complete a fund transfer or withdrawal. If you meet the monthly qualifications for KASASA CASH BACK Checking, those ATM fees will be reimbursed. If an individual ATM fee is $5.00 or higher, you must contact us for reimbursement within sixty (60) calendar days of the withdrawal transaction, and you must also have your receipt. ATM fee reimbursements will be credited to your KASASA CASH BACK Checking account on the last day of the current statement cycle. When KASASA CASH BACK checking qualifications are not met, no ATM fees will be refunded. Monthly Qualification Cycle and Monthly Statement Cycle Explanation Monthly Qualification Cycle means a period beginning one banking day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one banking day prior to the close of the current statement cycle. Your account will be automatically qualified on that one day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle. What this means for you is if you did not qualify for the higher preferred rate, you might notice a slightly higher than the base rate APY earned on your statement due to the one day (the last day) being calculated with the higher preferred rate. The qualification cycle is the 21st of the month through the 20th of the next month. The qualification cycle may end earlier if the 20th falls on a weekend or holiday. Other Account Information SENB reserves the right to limit the number of accounts to two (2) accounts per social security number. Rates and rewards are variable and may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings. If you choose not to have electronic delivery of eStatements, your account will be converted to SENB Essential after three (3) monthly qualification cycles. Other Contract Terms To receive your monthly statement electronically, the following minimum computer hardware and software requirements must be met: One of the following operating systems: Windows XP, 2000 or Macintosh OSX. A secure session is established by using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption and a compatible browser, such as; Internet Explorer 7.0, Netscape 7.2, Mozilla Firefox 1.0 or Safari 1.2.</span></span></p>

    <h1>Interest Rates</h1>

<p>Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Yield (APY) are current as of 11/05/2018.<br>
Rates may vary and are subject to change without notice.</p>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <div class="button-group">
  <a href="https://statebt.tfaforms.net/4643265" class="button">Open Now</a>
</div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <h2>Personal Money Market and Business/Commercial Money Market Accounts</h2>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <table class="RateTable">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th id="row_title" scope="col">&nbsp;</th>
      <th id="interest_rate" scope="col">Interest Rate</th>
      <th id="annual_percentage_yield_apy" scope="col">Annual Percentage Yield (APY)</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  
    <tr>
      <td headers="row_title">Up to $2,499.99</td>
      <td headers="interest_rate" style="text-align: center;">0.50%</td>
      <td headers="annual_percentage_yield_apy" style="text-align: center;">0.50%</td>
    </tr>
  
    <tr>
      <td headers="row_title">$2,500.00 and up</td>
      <td headers="interest_rate" style="text-align: center;">0.50%</td>

    </tr>

</table>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <p>Minimum balance required to obtain APY: None. Minimum opening deposit: $100. The APY may vary after the account is opened. Fees could reduce earnings. See us for complete details about the premium rate.</p>

<p>*Accounts are subject to approval. Both the Personal and Business Money Market Accounts require a $100 deposit to open the account and there is no minimum balance requirement to earn interest including the premium rate. All balances can earn the .50% APY/Interest Rate and can also earn the premium rate of 1.00% APY/Interest Rate by maintaining a State Bank Checking account and making at least 10 transactions per month/statement cycle or receive at least 1 ACH Direct Deposit per month/statement cycle. The premium rate will be applied the following statement cycle and will remain assuming the customer continues to make at least 10 transactions from or receives at least 1 ACH Direct Deposit to their checking account per month/statement cycle. Fees may reduce earnings. Interest Rates and APYs are subject to change at any time.</p>

    <p>Minimum balance required to obtain APY: None. Minimum opening deposit: $100. The APY may vary after the account is opened. Fees could reduce earnings.</p>

<p>**The Premier Money Market account is available to consumer and business account holders. Accounts are subject to approval. The Premier Money Market accounts requires a $100 deposit to open the account and there is no minimum balance requirement to earn .50% Annual Percentage Yield (APY). Balances of $250,000 or greater can earn 1.00% APY, balances of $1,000,000 or greater can earn 1.25% APY, &nbsp;balances of $5,000,000 up to $19,999,999.99 can earn 1.50% APY, and balances over $20,000,000.00 can earn 1.50% APY. Fees may reduce earnings. Interest Rates and APYs are subject to change at any time.</p>

    <p>Minimum opening deposit and balance to earn interest: $1,000. Early withdrawal penalties may apply. Ask us about other CD maturities and yields.</p>

<p>*Business and consumer deposits welcome for 13 Month and&nbsp;17 Month Certificate of Deposit. CD terms require a $1000 minimum opening deposit and minimum balance to accrue the advertised Annual Percentage Yield (APY). APY assumes principal&nbsp;and interest remain on deposit for the full term of the certificate. Interest payments will be credited annually. Penalty will be imposed for early withdrawal. Fees could reduce earnings. Interest Rate and APY&nbsp;may change at the Banks discretion. Deposits are FDIC insured to the maximum allowed by law. For deposits of $250,000 or more, please contact a State Bank branch. The promotional rates for the 13 Month and&nbsp;17 month CD&nbsp;are&nbsp;not valid for brokerage deposits, institutional investors, public funds, financial institutions, or in conjunction with other promotional offers. At maturity, the 13 month CDs will renew as a 12 month CD and&nbsp;the 17 month CDs will renew as an 18 month CD.</p>

      <td headers="row_title">Premium Select Checking - $2,500.00 to $49,999.99</td>
      <td headers="interest_rate" style="text-align: center;">0.10%</td>
      <td headers="annual_percentage_yield_apy" style="text-align: center;">0.10%</td>
    </tr>
  
    <tr>
      <td headers="row_title">Premium Select Checking - $50,000.00 and up</td>
      <td headers="interest_rate" style="text-align: center;">0.15%</td>
      <td headers="annual_percentage_yield_apy" style="text-align: center;">0.15%</td>
    </tr>
  
  </tbody>
</table>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <p>Minimum balance required to obtain APY on Interest Checking Accounts: None.<br>
Minimum opening deposit on all Interest Checking Accounts: $100.&nbsp;<br>
Fees could reduce earnings on Premium Select Checking Accounts.</p>

      <th id="row_title" scope="col">&nbsp;</th>

      <th id="annual_percentage_yield_apy" scope="col">Annual Percentage Yield (APY)</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  
    <tr>
      <td headers="row_title">Savings (Personal and Commercial)</td>
      <td headers="interest_rate" style="text-align: center;">0.25%</td>
      <td headers="annual_percentage_yield_apy" style="text-align: center;">0.25%</td>
    </tr>
  
  </tbody>
</table>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <p>Minimum balance required to obtain APY: $100. Minimum opening deposit: $100.The APY may vary after the account is opened. Fees could reduce earnings.</p>
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
    <div class="panel radius">
  <p>DISCLAIMER: Interest Rates and Annual Percentage Yields may vary and are subject to change without notice.</p>

https://banktoledo.com/personal/checking/green, #rt-mainbody > div > article > div, <div itemprop="articleBody">
	<p>Call us at 641-484-2980 for current rates and terms.</p>
<p>Earn 0.90% APY Bonus rate* and Nationwide ATM Refunds** if requirements are met</p>
<p>Or 0.15% APY standard rate if requirements are not met</p>
<p>To earn the Bonus Rate, perform the following requirements each monthly qualification cycle:</p>
 
<ul class="gk_bullet1">
<li>Have ten or more debit card purchases post and clear per monthly qualification cycle</li>
<li>Have one or more Direct Deposit or ACH Auto Debit post and clear per qualification cycle</li>
<li>Log in to view your account activity electronically one or more times per qualification cycle</li>
<li>Receive your statement electronically</li>
</ul>
<p>*0.90% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) paid on all daily balances $0.01-$25,000.00 and 0.15% APY* paid on daily balances $25,000.01 and above each monthly qualification cycle if the minimum requirements are met. If you do not meet the requirements per monthly qualification cycle, your account will still function as a free checking account earning 0.15% APY, however it will not receive ATM refunds for that time period. We may change the interest rate and APY for any or all of the tiers for this account at any time after the account is opened. No minimum Balance Required. However you must deposit a minimum of $100.00 and have the ability to access your account electronically in order to open this account. Available to Personal Accounts only. No monthly service charge.</p>
<p>**Free ATM Refunds up to $25.00 per qualification cycle. Include all transaction fees charged when using another banks ATM. ATM fee refunds are automatic and receipts are not required to receive refunds</p>
<p>If you use Popmoney to transfer funds to another person, we will refund up to $.50 of the transaction fee, up to $5.00 each qualification cycle, regardless of whether you meet the above requirments to earn the higher interest rate. <a href="http://www.onlinebanktours.com/oec/?b=1312&amp;c=15739&amp;p=44895">Click &amp; Learn more about Popmoney.</a><a href="#15739,11654,1,12"></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p></div>

	 <div class="row-fluid toggle-row no-rule">  <div id="toggle_CDs" class="span12 toggle-container toggle-tertiary open" data-title="Fixed-Rate Certificates of Deposit (CDs)" data-toggle-id="3c2ac819-ecaf-5e09-3cfb-dc84d8a27dbc"><div class="toggle-title" data-toggle-handler="3c2ac819-ecaf-5e09-3cfb-dc84d8a27dbc" style="display: inline-block;"><h4><a id="sfx_toggle_CDs_a" href="#" role="button" aria-controls="ff209ff2-40e8-081f-ecd2-ee1ff851f88f" aria-expanded="true">Fixed-Rate Certificates of Deposit (CDs)</a></h4></div><span style="vertical-align: top"><b><sup style="vertical-align: super;"><a aria-describedby="footnoteRef" class="refFoot footnote_1.3" href="#footnote_1.3" id="toggle_CDs_note1">1</a></sup></b></span>  <div id="ff209ff2-40e8-081f-ecd2-ee1ff851f88f" data-toggle-group="3c2ac819-ecaf-5e09-3cfb-dc84d8a27dbc" class="toggle-content ">
    	
    <p class="sfx-text "> Special Term CDs renew automatically at maturity into the next highest Standard Term CD.</p>
    <p class="sfx-text "> Consider a fixed-rate CD for predictable income or a way to grow your savings.</p>

    <p class="sfx-text "><sup><a aria-describedby="returnToFootnote" href="#toggle_CDs_note1" class="trueFootnote footnote_1.3" id="footnote_1.3">[1]</a></sup> A penalty may be imposed for early withdrawals, which could reduce the Annual Percentage Yield (APY). Minimum opening deposit for an account less than $100,000 is $500.  Rates are subject to change.  The interest rate and APY are assigned the time of account application for a new CD and on the maturity date for an existing CD.</p>

                day[5] = "Friday";
                day[6] = "Saturday";

    var curr_month = month[d.getMonth()];
    var curr_date = d.getDate();
    var curr_year = d.getFullYear();

<h6>*APY = Annual Percentage Yield. Annual Percentage Yields are compounded daily and credited monthly. Rates subject to change. Fees could reduce earnings. Early withdrawal penalties may apply for Certificates of Deposit.</h6>

<h2><a name="depositrates"></a></h2>

<h2>Deposit Rates</h2>

<p>These rates and terms applicable to your account at the Credit Union are provided in this Rate and Fee Schedule. Superior Credit Union may offer other rates for these accounts from time to time.&nbsp;<!--StartFragment-->Fees could reduce earnings on share accounts. Click here to view our <a href="/home/fiFiles/static/documents/SCU Disclosure Share Rate &amp; Fee Schedule 110118.pdf">Fee Schedule</a> and please contact us with any questions you may have.<!--EndFragment--> <em>Effective <span class="effective_current_date">November 23, 2018</span> </em>.<br>
&nbsp;</p>

<table align="center" border="2" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="1" style="width: 490px; height: 56px;" width="490">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: center;"><strong>Check out how our deposit rates compare to other financial institutions in the region with this <a href="/home/fiFiles/static/documents/RWRanking_2018_11.pdf">RateWatch report</a>!</strong></td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<h2><a name="loanrates"></a></h2>

<h2>Loan Rates</h2>

<p>These rates and terms applicable to your account at the Credit Union are provided in the tables below. Rates are based upon individual credit and all loans are subject to credit approval. No application fee for standard rates. No early payoff penalties. Payments received 10 days or more past the due date are subject to a late fee equal to 5% of the scheduled payment amount. <em>EFFECTIVE <span class="effective_current_date">November 23, 2018</span> </em>.</p>

<p><strong>APR</strong> = Annual Percentage Rate</p>
<a name="vehicle-new"></a>

Variable rates as low as 4.75% APR (0.01301% daily periodic rate) following intro period, based upon Prime Rate published in the Wall Street Journal minus a margin of (0.50%). Variable rate is subject to change monthly. Floor rate is 3.00% APR, maximum rate is 15.00% APR (0.041% daily periodic rate). Other rates available. Annual fee of $25 will apply. Maximum loan-to-value is 85%.</p>

<h3>Signature Loans &nbsp; &nbsp;<a href="/home/borrow/onlineloanapp"><img alt="Apply Online" hspace="5" src="/home/fiFiles/static/images/button_applyonline.png"></a></h3>

<h6>* Daily balance (the amount of principal in the account each day)<br>
Rates are subject to change without notice.<br>
Fees may reduce the earnings on the account.<br>
A penalty may be imposed for early withdrawal on certificates.</h6>

$15,000</div><div class="productSummary"><h3>Enjoy high interest earnings and refunds on ATM fees.*</h3>
<p><span>With free Kasasa Cash checking, we literally pay you to bank with us. Earn up to 2.75% APY* on your balance with refunds on ATM fees, nationwide. That means every ATM is <em>your</em> ATM.</span></p>
<p><span>As a Kasasa Cash account holder, you can also open a free Kasasa Saver to help you boost your savings. Open your accounts online in minutes.</span></p></div><div class="primaryButton"><a href="/popup/current-ah.html?product=7b461759-c8d9-4bc0-8adf-8a1460e688f4" class="currentAHPopup fancybox fancybox.iframe">Open Now</a></div><ul class="secondaryButtons"><li class="questions"><a href="/popup/questions.html?productInode=7b461759-c8d9-4bc0-8adf-8a1460e688f4&amp;dynamicFormType=tellMeMore" class="fancybox fancybox.iframe">Ask a Question <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li><li><a class="calcLink calcPopup fancybox fancybox.iframe calc" href="/tools/calculators/reward-checking.html?questions=false&amp;learnmore=false"><i class="fa fa-calculator" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i> Calculate My Rewards <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li></ul></div><div id="productDetails" class="tabsTop"><dl id="productTabs" class="has1 noMobile ae-tabset" style="height: 925px;" role="tablist"><dt class="tab-summary label selected ae-label ae-tabset-tab ae-tabset-activetab" role="tab" tabindex="0" aria-controls="ae_mel_tabpanel_0" id="ae_mel_tab_0" aria-expanded="true">Summary</dt><dd class="pane ae-tabset-content" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ae_mel_tab_0" id="ae_mel_tabpanel_0" aria-hidden="false"><div class="tabDiv"><p><span><strong>Benefits</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>Free checking that pays high interest</span></li>
<li><span>2.75% APY* on balances up to $15,000</span></li>
<li><span>2.75% to 1.35% APY on balances over $15,000 depending on balance in account*</span></li>
<li><span>0.05% APY* if qualifications aren't met</span></li>
<li><span>Refunds on ATM fees, nationwide (up to $20 monthly)*</span></li>
<li><span>Free Kasasa Saver account available </span></li>
<li><span>No minimum balance to earn rewards</span></li>
<li><span>No monthly service fee</span></li>
<li><span>Free online banking &amp; bill pay</span></li>
<li><span>Free mobile banking</span></li>
<li><span>Free eStatements</span></li>
<li><span>Free Visa debit card</span></li>
<li><span>Free telephone banking</span></li>
<li><span>Unlimited check writing</span></li>
<li><span>$100 minimum deposit to open</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span>Please note that <strong>receiving eStatements and having at least one direct deposit is a condition of having this account.</strong></span></p>
<p><span><strong>It's so easy to earn rewards!</strong></span></p>
<p><span>To earn your rewards, just do the following transactions and activities in your Kasasa Cash account during each Monthly Qualification Cycle:</span></p>
<ul role="presentation">
<li role="presentation"><span>Have at least 16 debit card purchases post and settle</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span><strong>And if you don't meet this qualification, don't worry.</strong></span></p>
<p><span>Your account is still free. Plus, you'll still earn our base rate. And you can get right back to earning your full rewards the very next cycle that you qualify.</span></p></div></dd></dl><dl id="productTabsMobile" class="has1 mobile ae-exclude"><dt class="tab-summary selected">Summary</dt><dd style="display: block;"><p><span><strong>Benefits</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>Free checking that pays high interest</span></li>
<li><span>2.75% APY* on balances up to $15,000</span></li>
<li><span>2.75% to 1.35% APY on balances over $15,000 depending on balance in account*</span></li>
<li><span>0.05% APY* if qualifications aren't met</span></li>
<li><span>Refunds on ATM fees, nationwide (up to $20 monthly)*</span></li>
<li><span>Free Kasasa Saver account available </span></li>
<li><span>No minimum balance to earn rewards</span></li>
<li><span>No monthly service fee</span></li>
<li><span>Free online banking &amp; bill pay</span></li>
<li><span>Free mobile banking</span></li>
<li><span>Free eStatements</span></li>
<li><span>Free Visa debit card</span></li>
<li><span>Free telephone banking</span></li>
<li><span>Unlimited check writing</span></li>
<li><span>$100 minimum deposit to open</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span>Please note that <strong>receiving eStatements and having at least one direct deposit is a condition of having this account.</strong></span></p>
<p><span><strong>It's so easy to earn rewards!</strong></span></p>
<p><span>To earn your rewards, just do the following transactions and activities in your Kasasa Cash account during each Monthly Qualification Cycle:</span></p>
<ul role="presentation">
<li role="presentation"><span>Have at least 16 debit card purchases post and settle</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span><strong>And if you don't meet this qualification, don't worry.</strong></span></p>
<p><span>Your account is still free. Plus, you'll still earn our base rate. And you can get right back to earning your full rewards the very next cycle that you qualify.</span></p></dd></dl><div id="productDisclaimer" class="disclaimer"><p class="disclaimer"><span><strong>*Qualification Information:</strong> Account transactions and activities may take one or more days to post and settle to the account and all must do so during the Monthly Qualification Cycle in order to qualify for the account's rewards. The following activities do not count toward earning account rewards: ATM-processed transactions, transfers between accounts, debit card purchases processed by merchants and received by our bank as ATM transactions, non-retail payment transactions, and purchases made with debit cards not issued by our bank. "Monthly Qualification Cycle" means a period beginning one (1) business day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one (1) business day prior to the close of the current statement cycle.</span></p>
<p class="disclaimer"><span><strong>Reward Information: </strong>When your Kasasa Cash account qualifications are met during a Monthly Qualification Cycle: An interest rate of 2.72% will be paid on the portion of your balance that is less than or equal to $15,000. The annual percentage yield for this tier is 2.75%. An interest rate of 0.50% will be paid on the portion of your balance that is greater than $15,000 resulting in an annual percentage yield ranging from 2.75% to 1.35%, depending on the balance in the account. When your Kasasa Cash account qualifications are not met, the interest rate paid on the entire balance will be 0.05% with an annual percentage yield of 0.05%; (2) you will receive reimbursements up to $20.00 ($5.00 per single transaction) for nationwide ATM fees incurred during the Monthly Qualification Cycle in which you qualified.</span></p>
<p class="disclaimer"><span>*APY = Annual Percentage Yield. APYs accurate as of 07/02/18. Rates and rewards are variable and may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.</span></p>
<p class="disclaimer"><span><strong>Additional Information: </strong> Account approval, conditions, qualifications, limits, timeframes, enrollments, and other requirements apply. A deposit of $100 is required to open the account. Monthly Direct Deposit, enrollment to receive estatements, and sixteen debit card purchases are conditions of this account. Limit one Kasasa account per primary social security number. There are no recurring monthly service charges or fees to open this account. Contact one of our Bank's customer service representatives for additional information, details, restrictions, processing limitations and enrollment instructions. Member FDIC. Kasasa, Kasasa Cash, Kasasa Cash Back and Kasasa Saver are trademarks of BancVue, Ltd., registered in the U.S.A.</span></p></div><div class="bottomButton"><div class="primaryButton"><a href="/popup/current-ah.html?product=7b461759-c8d9-4bc0-8adf-8a1460e688f4" class="currentAHPopup fancybox fancybox.iframe">Open Now</a></div></div></div></div>

	<td class="column-1"><b class=" tablesaw-cell-label"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">ACCOUNT</font></b><span class="tablesaw-cell-content"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">II</font></span></td><td class="column-2"><b class=" tablesaw-cell-label"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">APY</font></b><span class="tablesaw-cell-content"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">0.20%</font></span></td><td class="column-3"><b class=" tablesaw-cell-label"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">INTEREST RATE</font></b><span class="tablesaw-cell-content"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">0.20%</font></span></td><td class="column-4"><b class=" tablesaw-cell-label"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">COMPOUNDED</font></b><span class="tablesaw-cell-content"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">Monthly</font></span></td><td class="column-5"><b class=" tablesaw-cell-label"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">MINIMUM BALANCE</font></b><span class="tablesaw-cell-content"><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">$200,000-$499,999.99</font></span></td>

                                    (1) $1 minimum balance to open account only. There is no minimum balance to avoid fees or obtain the annual percentage yield.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(2) Not available to businesses</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(3) MMDA rate reverts to NOW rate when average balance falls below minimum.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(4) Available to individuals only.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(5) A minimum balance fee of $15.00 will be imposed every month if the balance in the account falls below $15,000 any day of the month.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(6) Available to businesses and non-profit organizations. Not available to municipalities.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
(7) A minimum balance fee of $20.00 will be imposed every month if the balance in the account falls below $15,000 on any day of the month.</font><br><font style="font-size:100%" my="my">
All interest rates and Annual Percentage Yields (APYs) are accurate as indicated above and are subject to change any time without prior notice. Fees may reduce earnings.                                </font></p>

<div class="block-content">
<div class="loop"><article id="post-18" class="post-18 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry author-imdtracy personal " itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/CreativeWork"><a href="https://baldwinstatebank.com/personal/" class="post-thumbnail post-thumbnail-left">

			</a><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><h1>At Baldwin State Bank, weve put the PERSON back in personal banking.</h1>
<p>Our friendly, hometown staff is here to help you with everything from checking and savings to preparing for retirement. &nbsp;Were here to listen, answer your questions, and help you find the right account for your financial goals.</p>
<p>Compare&nbsp;our personal financial products below.</p></div></article></div>

<p>During any calendar month, you may not make more than six withdrawals or transfers to another account of yours or to a third party by means of a preauthorized or automatic transfer or telephone order or instruction, or by check,draft, debit card or similar order to a third party. If you exceed the transfer limitations set forth above in any statement period, your account will be subject to closure by the financial institution.</p>

<tr>
<td width="40%" align="left">$5,000  $20,000</td>
<td width="30%" align="left">1.15</td>
<td width="30%" align="left">1.16</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="40%" align="left">$20,000 &amp; over</td>
<td width="30%" align="left">1.15</td>
<td width="30%" align="left">1.16</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="3">The interest rate and maturity date of 18 Month IRAs are established on the date of issue or renewal, with the interest rate (or index) guaranteed for the initial term. All IRAs may be subject to fees which would reduce earnings.<br>
* Annual Percentage Yield (APY).</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p><span style="color: #ff0000;"></span></p></div></div><div class="su-spoiler su-spoiler-style-default su-spoiler-icon-plus-circle product-spoiler su-spoiler-closed"><div class="su-spoiler-title"><span class="su-spoiler-icon"></span>View Penalties</div><div class="su-spoiler-content su-clearfix"><p></p>
<ul>
<li class="PageText">Early withdrawal is subject to a bank penalty</li>
</ul>

    OnePoint Checking</u></b><br>

http://www.bankofcalhouncounty.com/deposits.asp#cd, #content, <div id="content">
	    <h1>Deposits</h1>
<ul>
<li><a href="#check">Checking Accounts </a></li>
<li><a href="#save">Savings Accounts </a></li>
<li><a href="#cd">CDs / IRAs </a></li>
<li><a href="#fees">Fees </a></li>
</ul>
<h2><a name="check"></a>Checking Accounts</h2>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Personal Checking</span> - This is our basic checking account.&nbsp; It is free checking, with a $100 minimum to open.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Prestige Plus Checking</span> - This is our premier checking account.&nbsp; For just $5 per month you get all of these benefits:</p>
<ul>
<li>Free checks</li>
<li>Free cashier's checks</li>
<li>Prescription &amp; car rental discounts</li>
<li>1% earnings on the balance</li>
<li>And much, much more</li>
</ul>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Prestige 50 Plus Checking</span> - This is the same as our Prestige Plus Checking, but with a $4 fee and is only available to our patrons who are 50 and over.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Commercial Checking</span> - This is our business checking account.&nbsp; It is free checking, with a $100 minimum to open.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Money Market Checking</span> -&nbsp; This is interest bearing checking.&nbsp; Requires a minimum of $2,500 to open account, and you can make six (6) transfers from your account per statement cycle.&nbsp; $10.00 fee if balance falls below $2,500.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">NOW Checking</span>  This is interest bearing checking.&nbsp; Free checking with $1,000 minimum to open. $5.00 fee if the balance falls below $1,000.&nbsp; APY penalty if balance falls below $750.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Super NOW</span>  This is interest bearing checking.&nbsp; Free checking with $5,000 minimum to open.&nbsp; $20.00 fee if the balance falls below $5,000.&nbsp; APY penalty if balance falls below $2,500.</p>
<h2><a name="save"></a>Savings Accounts</h2>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Personal Savings</span> - This is our basic savings account that earns interest.&nbsp;(Call any of our locations for current rates.) It is a free account, with a $50 minimum to open.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Christmas Club</span> - This is a separate savings account that earns interest.&nbsp; It has no minimum to open, and checks are distributed annually by the 2nd week of November.&nbsp; No early withdraws are permitted.&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<h2><a name="cd"></a>CDs / IRAs</h2>
<table class="rates" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" align="center">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="ratesH" colspan="3" align="left">&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="ratesT" align="left"><span># of Months/Days</span></td>
<td class="ratesT" align="left"><span>APY</span></td>
<td class="ratesT" align="left"><span>Rate</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>60 Months</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>1.41</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>1.40</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>48 Months</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>1.00</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>1.00</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>36 Months</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>0.90</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>0.90</span></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>30 Months</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>0.80</span></td>
<td class="rates" align="left"><span>0.80</span></td>
</tr>

<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Certificates of Deposit</span>  This is an interest bearing account.&nbsp; A minimum of $1,000 to open the account.&nbsp; Additional deposits to this account not allowed.&nbsp; Penalty for early withdraw.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">IRAs</span>  The Bank of Calhoun County offers both, Traditional &amp; Roth IRAs.&nbsp; Rates are the same as our CD rates.&nbsp; For more information on our IRAs or any bank product, please contact our Hardin Facility.</p>
<p>We update our rates monthly and often run CD specials.&nbsp; Check back for updates!</p>
<p>Rates subject to change at anytime.<br> Reserve the right to restrict deposits to our trade area.</p>

			<div class="Detail Body"><ul>
	<li>Annual Percentage Yield (APY)</li>
	<li>All interest is credited monthly.</li>
	<li>Interest is paid from day of deposit to day of withdrawal, if minimum balance is maintained.</li>
	<li>Fees can reduce earnings of an account.</li>
	<li>Interest rates are subject to change at the discretion of Needham Bank.</li>
	<li>All Deposits are fully insured. The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insures the first $250,000 of deposits, the Share Insurance Fund (SIF) insures all deposits above that amount.</li>
	<li>For CDs and IRA accounts: a substantial penalty is required if partial or full withdrawal is made before CD or IRA maturity.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>
https://parknationalbank.com/personal/personal-bank/savings/money-market-accounts/, #main_content, <section id="main_content">
<section class=" div-padding-personal bg-white text-left">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="columns fw-light large-12 end content large">
						<div class="row">
				<div class="columns end">
					<h1 class="heading-1" style="margin-bottom: 5px;">Money Market Account</h1>
				</div>
			</div>
																			<p>Its important for your financial health to make your money work for you. Our money market Account gives you access to your funds (unlike a <a href="/personal/personal-bank/personal-certificate-deposit-cd/">certificate of deposit</a>) while still earning interest on your balance.</p>
<h4>Account Features</h4>
<ul style="width: 45%;">
<li>Interest paid monthly</li>
<li>Direct deposit</li>
<li>Write checks or make online transfers (up to 6 per month)</li>
<li>Paperless statements with image retrieval or mailed statements</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><a href="/personal/other-services/personal-anytime-banking/online-banking/">Free online banking</a></li>
<li><a href="/personal/other-services/personal-anytime-banking/mobile-banking/">Free mobile banking</a></li>
<li><a href="/business/bank/anytime-banking/telebanking/">Free telebanking</a></li>
<li>Interest is earned based upon your average available account balance</li>
</ul>
<h4>Account Maintenance Fee</h4>
<ul>
<li>Free with average available monthly balance over $1,000.</li>
<li>$10/month with average available monthly balance below $1,000.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Requirements</h4>
<ul>
<li>Minimum balance to open account is $50.</li>
<li>Minimum balance to earn interest is $1,000.</li>
</ul>
									</div></div>
	
	<div class="clearall"></div>
</section>
<div class="div-padding bg-white" style="">

<section class="bg-white related_pages">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 small-centered columns clearfix full-width-3-col">
						        					<div class="large-4 medium-4 columns end vertical_center has_buttons type--page" style="height: 228px;">
					<h4 class="ff-primary fw-light pdr-1 dark">Anytime Banking</h4>
					<p></p><p>There are several ways to manage your money from outside a banking office. Were always glad to see you in person, but we know that sometimes its more convenient to handle your banking from home or while on-the-go.</p>
<p></p>
					<div class="button_wrap">
						<a href="https://parknationalbank.com/personal-anytime-banking/" class="button blocked-out">learn more</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			        					<div class="large-4 medium-4 columns end vertical_center has_buttons type--page" style="height: 228px;">
					<h4 class="ff-primary fw-light pdr-1 dark">Individual Retirement Plans (IRAs)  Deposit Based</h4>
					<p></p><p>Support your retirement goals with an IRA. We offer various options and will help you select an IRA that suits your needs. You can benefit from potential tax advantages, save money for retirement, and grow your funds.</p>
<p></p>
