<script>
	'use strict';
	jQuery(document).ready(function () {
	    var _this = this;
	    function calculateSavings(calculator) {
	        var $calc = calculator,
	            base_price = parseInt($calc.find('.base_price').val()),
	            $totals = $calc.find('.totals'),
	            $checked = $calc.find('input:checked'),
	            modifiers = [],
	            mods = [];
	        $checked.map(function (i, el) {
	            return modifiers.push(parseInt(jQuery(el).val()));
	        });
	        mods = modifiers.reduce(function (base, val) {
	            return base + parseInt(val);
	        });
	        var $total = base_price + mods;
	        $total = $total >= 0 ? $total : 0;
	        $totals.text("$" + $total);
	        console.log('total: ' + $total);
	    }
	    jQuery('.calculator').on('change', function (e) {
	        return calculateSavings(jQuery(_this));
	    });
	    calculateSavings(jQuery('.calculator'));
	});
</script><section class="colored_tiles bg-light-gray">

                <div class="requirment">
                    <p>To earn 1.51% APY and domestic ATM fee/surcharge refunds, per statement period you must:</p>
<ul>
<li>Conduct ten (10) signature-based, point-of-sale purchases with your Provident Debit Mastercard that post and clear your account.</li>

<li>Elect to receive your periodic account statements via ProvidentConnect Online Banking.</li>
</ul>

                <p id="terms"><sup>1</sup>An interest rate of 1.50% with an Annual Percentage Yield (APY) of 1.51% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is $15,000 or less. An interest rate of 0.50% with an APY ranging from 1.11% to 1.51% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is more than $15,000, but less than or equal to $25,000. An interest rate of 0.15% with an APY ranging from 0.15% to 1.11% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance that is greater than $25,000. The interest rates and APYs will be paid provided that the Provident $MART Checking qualification requirements are met in the corresponding statement period. If you do not meet the qualification requirements for a statement period, your account will still function as a free checking account earning 0.05% APY; however, it will not receive ATM fee refunds for that statement period. APY is in effect as of 12/1/12. APYs are variable and may change at any time after the account is opened. No minimum account balance required, however, you must deposit a minimum of $50 to open this account. Withdrawal/transfer restrictions apply; ask for details or see account disclosure. Available to consumer/personal account holders only. No monthly service charges. 
<sup>2</sup>All nationwide ATM fees will be refunded provided qualification requirements are met. All qualifying transactions must post and clear your account within one (1) statement period. Account holder/owner must sign up for and maintain a free ProvidentConnect online banking relationship. Online opening for this account is for New Jersey and Pennsylvania residents only.
<sup>3</sup>You must conduct at least ten (10) signature-based POS purchases which post and clear your account within one (1) statement period. You must receive at least one (1) ACH direct deposit or process at least one (1) automatic debit which posts and clears your account within one (1) statement period.</p>

</div>
</div><div class="sfContentBlock"><h2>Best Rates on Savings</h2>
<p>At Third Federal, our High-Yield Savings Account can pay you the highest rate. You can open this account as a regular savings account or as an IRA accountthe choice is yours. Either way, the High-Yield Savings Account offers:</p>
<ul class="bullet-list">
    <li>No Monthly Fees</li>
    <li>No Limit on Monthly Transactions</li>
    <li>Easy Access to Your Funds</li>
</ul>

Apply today!">Saving</a><span class="sfBreadcrumbNodeSeparator">/</span></li> <li class="rsmItem sfNoBreadcrumbNavigation"><a class="rsmLink" href="javascript: void(0)" title="Our High-Yield Checking Account is designed for customers who want higher interest rates on checking accounts &amp; excellent personal service. Apply today!">Checking Accounts</a></li>
		</ul><input id="ctl00_MainContent_T0DAD1C74002_ctl00_ctl00_Breadcrumb_ClientState" name="ctl00_MainContent_T0DAD1C74002_ctl00_ctl00_Breadcrumb_ClientState" type="hidden">
	</div>
</div>
</div><div class="sfContentBlock"><h2>Best Rates on Checking</h2>
<p>Third Federals High-Yield Checking Account is designed for customers who want more from their financial institution: higher interest rates on checking accounts and excellent customer service.&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>High-Yield Checking Account Benefits:</strong></p>
<ul class="bullet-list">
    <li>Monthly service charge of $7 is waived if you maintain an average daily balance of $1,500 in your High-Yield Checking Account or $1,500 in total balances in all your Third Federal deposit accounts. </li>
    <li>Free debit card purchases with our <a href="/saving/checking-accounts/debit-card">Third Federal Debit Card</a>. Make purchases everywhere Debit MasterCard is accepted. You can also use the card to withdraw cash from your checking account at any Fifth Third Bank ATM. </li>
    <li>Write more checks than you could with a typical money market account. </li>
    <li>Use <a href="/online-mobile-banking">online banking</a> to manage your High-Yield Checking Accounts online.</li>
</ul>


</div>

			<li class="rsmItem sfBreadcrumbNavigation"><a class="rsmLink" href="../home" title="We offer guaranteed low-rate mortgages, home equity lines of credit, savings accounts &amp; more! Use our calculators, review rates &amp; apply for a loan today!">Home</a><span class="sfBreadcrumbNodeSeparator">/</span></li> <li class="rsmItem sfBreadcrumbNavigation"><a class="rsmLink" href="../saving" title="With guaranteed rates we offer easy application &amp; full services for Certificates of Deposit, Retirement Accounts, Checking &amp; Savings Accounts. Apply today!">Saving</a><span class="sfBreadcrumbNodeSeparator">/</span></li> <li class="rsmItem sfNoBreadcrumbNavigation"><a class="rsmLink" href="javascript: void(0)" title="Our High-Yield Checking Account is designed for customers who want higher interest rates on checking accounts &amp; excellent personal service. Apply today!">Checking Accounts</a></li>
		</ul><input id="ctl00_MainContent_T0DAD1C74002_ctl00_ctl00_Breadcrumb_ClientState" name="ctl00_MainContent_T0DAD1C74002_ctl00_ctl00_Breadcrumb_ClientState" type="hidden">
	</div>
</div>
</div><div class="sfContentBlock"><h2>Best Rates on Checking</h2>
<p>Third Federals High-Yield Checking Account is designed for customers who want more from their financial institution: higher interest rates on checking accounts and excellent customer service.&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>High-Yield Checking Account Benefits:</strong></p>
<ul class="bullet-list">
    <li>Monthly service charge of $7 is waived if you maintain an average daily balance of $1,500 in your High-Yield Checking Account or $1,500 in total balances in all your Third Federal deposit accounts. </li>
    <li>Free debit card purchases with our <a href="/saving/checking-accounts/debit-card">Third Federal Debit Card</a>. Make purchases everywhere Debit MasterCard is accepted. You can also use the card to withdraw cash from your checking account at any Fifth Third Bank ATM. </li>
    <li>Write more checks than you could with a typical money market account. </li>
    <li>Use <a href="/online-mobile-banking">online banking</a> to manage your High-Yield Checking Accounts online.</li>
</ul>


</div>

<p>All of Third Federals CDs offer great rates with low minimums and its easy to get started. You can open your CD over the phone by calling 1-800-THIRD-FED, online at thirdfederal.com or at any of our full-service branches.</p>

	<div class="entry">
		<div class="breadcrumb">
		 		</div>
					<h1 class="page-title" id="ae_mel_caption1">Deposit Rates</h1>
			<div class="the_content"><p>The interest rates and annual percentage yields (APYs) stated below are accurate as of 06/30/16 and are subject to change without notice.&nbsp; You may call (888) 303-4TSB (4872) to obtain current information.</p>

<div id="tablepress-11_wrapper" class="dataTables_wrapper no-footer"><table id="tablepress-11" class="tablepress tablepress-id-11 dataTable no-footer" role="grid" data-ae-blurbtype="datatable">
<thead>
<tr class="row-1 odd" role="row"><th class="column-1 sorting_disabled" rowspan="1" colspan="1" style="width: 253px;" scope="col" role="columnheader" id="ae_mel_header_0_0">Bonus Rewards Checking</th><th class="column-2 sorting_disabled" rowspan="1" colspan="1" style="width: 96px;" scope="col" role="columnheader" id="ae_mel_header_0_1">Amount</th><th class="column-3 sorting_disabled" rowspan="1" colspan="1" style="width: 131px;" scope="col" role="columnheader" id="ae_mel_header_0_2">Interest Rate</th><th class="column-4 sorting_disabled" rowspan="1" colspan="1" style="width: 96px;" scope="col" role="columnheader" id="ae_mel_header_0_3">APY*</th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody class="row-hover">

<tr class="row-2 even" role="row">
	<td class="column-1" headers="ae_mel_header_0_0">See Below</td><td class="column-2" headers="ae_mel_header_0_1">See Below</td><td class="column-3" headers="ae_mel_header_0_2">See Below</td><td class="column-4" headers="ae_mel_header_0_3">See Below</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<!-- #tablepress-11 from cache -->
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 8pt;">*When the Bonus Rewards Checking qualifications are not met, the interest rate on your account will be .03% and the APY will be .03% on all balances.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 8pt;">When the Bonus Rewards Checking qualifications are met, the interest rate on your account and corresponding APY will be tiered.&nbsp; If your daily balance is less than $15,001, the interest rate paid on the entire balance will be 1.49% with an APY of 1.50%.&nbsp; An interest rate of .20% will be paid only for that portion of your daily balance $15,001 and greater.&nbsp; The APY for this tier will range from 1.50% to .37%, depending on the balance in the account.&nbsp; This APY range is based on $15,000 below the cap and $100,000 over the cap.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 8pt;">Qualifications include at least 15 point of sale (POS) TSB Debit Card purchases post and settle on your account during the monthly qualification cycle, at least one monthly direct deposit or automated clearing house (ACH) credit, minimum amount of $75, paid into your account during the monthly qualification cycle, and confirmed enrollment in TSB eStatements. Transactions must post to and settle during the monthly qualification cycle. ATM processed transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card transactions. Fees may reduce earnings.</span></p>

<table id="tablepress-12" class="tablepress tablepress-id-12" aria-describedby="ae_mel_caption1" data-ae-blurbtype="datatable">

                <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane remove-blank" id="tab5" aria-labelledby="tabTitle5" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">
                  <div class="tab-pane_top">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy30" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h3>Health Savings Account*</h3>
<p>medical savings.</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy31" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content text-right">
                            <div><span>Please <a href="/about-us/contact-us" data-link-id="/about-us/contact-us" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">contact us</a> or visit your <a href="/locations" data-link-id="/locations" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">local branch</a> for more information or to open a Health Savings Account. &nbsp;</span><br></div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_bottom bg-light">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy32" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <div><br></div>
<h5>Benefits of opening an HSA:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Tax savings  tax-deductible contributions, tax-deferred earnings, tax-free withdrawals (if used properly)</li>
<li>Flexible  pay for current medical expenses or save for future ones</li>
<li>Funds in the HSA grow tax-free and carry over year after year</li>
<li>The HSA stays with you, regardless of change in coverage or employment</li>
</ul>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy33" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h5>To be eligible for an HSA, you must meet the following requirements:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Be enrolled in a qualified high deductible health plan (HDHP) &nbsp;</li>
<li>Not be covered by another non-HDHP (with limited exceptions)</li>
<li>Not enrolled in Medicare</li>
<li>Not eligible to be claimed as a dependent on another persons tax return</li>
</ul>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_footer">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-11 col-sm-offset-1">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy34" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <p><em><span class="small">*Because certain restrictions apply, please seek competent tax advice.</span></em><br></p>
<div><br></div>

                      </div>
                    </div>

                </div>

              <section class="tab-content m-b-xl" aria-live="polite" aria-relevant="text additions" aria-label="Tab contents">
                <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane remove-blank active" id="tab1" aria-labelledby="tabTitle1" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="false">
                  <div class="tab-pane_top">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy10" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h3>Direct Checking<sup>1</sup></h3>
<p>Do you use your debit card frequently or use direct deposit? Direct Checking is a straight forward and simple account to help you manage your money.&nbsp;</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy11" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content text-right">
                            <p>&nbsp;<a href="https://secure.andera.com/index.cfm?fiid=663077DF16D14D8095109B20706D35B4" data-link-id="" data-link-type-id="url" class="btn btn-primary  external" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Open Account<span class="sr-only"> (Opens in a new Window)</span></a></p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_bottom bg-light">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy12" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <ul>
<li>No minimum balance to open in a branch</li>
<li>Free <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Banking</a> with text alerts* and <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Check Deposit</a></li>

<li>Convenient <a href="/personal-banking/deposits/debit-mastercard" data-link-id="/personal-banking/deposits/debit-mastercard" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Debit Card</a></li>
<li><a href="/overdraft-coverage" data-link-id="/overdraft-coverage" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Overdraft Coverage</a></li>
</ul>
<div><br></div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy13" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <ul>
<li>A paper statement fee of $2.50 applies to this account.&nbsp; The $2.50 fee will not apply when you enroll in eStatements rather than paper statements.</li>
<li>This account has a monthly maintenance fee of $8. Enjoy this account without paying this monthly maintenance fee with direct deposits totaling $500 or more, or 10 debit card transactions per cycle.&nbsp; Receive a monthly credit of $8 when you do one of the two actions listed above.<br></li>
</ul>
                        </div>

<li>This account has a monthly maintenance fee of $12.&nbsp; Enjoy this account without paying this monthly maintenance fee by maintaining a current balance of $2,000 or more, or direct deposit totaling $1,000 or more per cycle. Receive a monthly credit of $12 when you do one of the two actions listed above.<br></li>

<li><a href="/overdraft-coverage" data-link-id="/overdraft-coverage" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Overdraft Coverage</a></li>
<li>Free paper statements</li>
<li>Maintain a $15,000 monthly average balance in combined deposit accounts including CDs and IRAs, or $25,000 in combined loan balances to avoid the $20 monthly fee.</li>
</ul>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_footer">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-11 col-sm-offset-1">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy29" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <p><em><span class="small">*Your wireless telecommunications provider may charge you for data usage. Check with your provider for details regarding your specific wireless plan and any data usage charges that may apply.</span></em></p>
<p><em><span class="small"><sup>1</sup> Minimum balance to open account in branch is $0. Minimum balance to open online account is $25.<br></span></em><em><span class="small"><sup>2</sup> Minimum balance to earn interest is $0.01.<br></span></em><em><span class="small"><sup>3</sup> All loans subject to credit approval.</span></em></p>
                        </div>

<h2 id="mcetoc_1bcb0lk4u0">True 62 Checking<sup>1</sup></h2>
<p>Enjoy free paper statements and the benefit of maintaining low balances with True 62 Checking.</p>
</div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy31" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content text-right">

                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_bottom bg-light">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy32" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <div>
<ul>
<li>No minimum balance to open your account in a branch or maintain your account</li>
<li>Free <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Banking</a> with text alerts* and <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Check Deposit</a></li>
<li>Free <a href="/personal-banking/services/online" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/online" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Internet Banking with Bill Pay</a></li>
<li>Convenient <a href="/personal-banking/deposits/debit-mastercard" data-link-id="/personal-banking/deposits/debit-mastercard" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Debit Card</a></li>

</ul>
</div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy33" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <ul>
<li>Free paper statements</li>
<li>At least one owner on the account must be age 62 or older</li>
<li>Enjoy this account without paying monthly maintenance fees by maintaining a current balance of $1000 or more, or with direct deposits totaling $300 or more. This account has a monthly maintenance fee of $5.&nbsp; Receive a monthly credit of $5 when you do one of the two actions listed above.</li>
</ul>

              <section class="tab-content m-b-xl" aria-live="polite" aria-relevant="text additions" aria-label="Tab contents">
                <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane remove-blank active" id="tab1" aria-labelledby="tabTitle1" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="false">
                  <div class="tab-pane_top">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy10" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <div>
<h3 tabindex="-1">Certificates of Deposit<sup>1</sup></h3>
<p>longer term savings.</p>
</div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">

https://www.tsbank.com/personal/checking/kasasa-cash.html, #productTabs, <dl id="productTabs" class="noMobile" style="height: 1515px;"><dt class="tab-benefits label selected">Benefits</dt><dd class="pane"><div class="tabDiv"><p><span>What's better than free checking that pays you high interest? It's not a trick question  it's Kasasa Cash. This account even refunds ATM fees nationwide.*</span></p>
<p><span>All you have to do to earn your full rewards are a few simple things you're probably doing already, like using your debit card and receiving eStatements. You'll even earn our base interest rate in the event you don't qualify, and your account is still always free.</span></p>
<p><span>Do you Kasasa?</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>Free checking that pays high interest</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Earn 2.51% APY* on balances up to $10,000</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Earn 2.51% to 0.42% APY on balances over $10,000 depending on balance in account*</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Earn 0.01% APY* if qualifications aren't met</span></li>
<li><span>Get refunds on ATM fees nationwide (up to $25 per cycle)*</span></li>
<li><span>Linked to your free&nbsp;<span><a href="http://www.tsbank.com/personal/savings/kasasa-saver.html">Kasasa Saver</a></span>&nbsp;for easy savings</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Have Kasasa Cash rewards transferred to Kasasa Saver</span></li>
<li><span>No monthly service fee</span></li>
<li><span>No minimum balance requirement</span></li>
<li><span>Enjoy unlimited check writing (client purchases checks)</span></li>
<li><span>Free debit card</span></li>
<li><span>Free&nbsp;<span><a href="http://www.tsbank.com/personal/services/online-services.html">online services</a></span>&nbsp;include:</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Free online banking with bill pay</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Free mobile banking</span></li>
<li class="textVariant1"><span>Free eStatements</span></li>
<li><span>Free telephone banking</span></li>
<li><span>$50 minimum deposit to open</span></li>
</ul>
<h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">How to Earn Our Highest Rate</h3>
<p><span>We've made earning your rewards super simple. In fact, you're probably doing most of these things already. To earn your rewards, simply do the following activities on your Kasasa Cash account each monthly qualification cycle:</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>Have at least 12 debit card purchases post and settle (ATM withdrawals do not count)</span></li>
<li><span>Have at least 1 direct deposit, ACH transaction, or bill payment transaction post and settle</span></li>
<li><span>Be enrolled and agree to receive eStatements</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span>That's it! And if for some reason you don't qualify one month, your account is still free and you'll still earn our base interest rate. You can get back to earning your full rewards the very next monthly qualification cycle.</span></p>
<p><span>For more clarification, please see our&nbsp;<span><a href="/documents/Qualification Calendar 2018 - TS Bank.pdf">Qualifications Calendar</a></span>.</span></p><p class="disclaimer">
        *APY=Annual Percentage Yield. APYs accurate as of 10/18/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.  Minimum to open is $50. If qualifications are met each monthly qualification cycle: (1) ATM fees incurred during qualification cycle will be reimbursed up to $25 and credited to account on the last day of monthly statement cycle; (2) balances up to $10,000 receive APY of 2.51%; and (3) balances over $10,000 earn 0.21% interest rate on portion of balance over $10,000, resulting in 2.51% - 0.42% APY depending on the balance. For example, if the account balance was $110,000, the APY would be 0.42%.  If qualifications are not met, all balances earn 0.01% APY. Qualifying transactions must post to and settle account during monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date transaction was made to post to and settle an account. Transfers between accounts do not count as qualifying transactions. ATM-processed transactions do not count toward qualifying debit card transactions. Monthly qualification cycle is not the same as monthly statement cycle. If qualifications are not met on Kasasa Cash you will not receive the highest rate of interest and ATM fees are not refunded.  ATM fee refunds up to $25 provided only if qualifications are met within the monthly qualification cycle and will be credited to the account on the last day of the monthly statement cycle. ATM Refunds up to $25 (up to $9.99 per single transaction) Available on personal accounts only. Limit one account per Social Security Number.
      </p></div></dd></dl>
http://www.tcnb.com/PERSONAL/Deposit-Rates.aspx, #rates, <div id="rates" class="page-content"><p class="no-top-margin">Rates effective as of November 23, 2018.</p>
<p>APY = Annual Percentage Yield. APR =&nbsp;Annual Percentage Rate.</p>
<p>APY assumes interest remains on deposit.&nbsp;Withdrawals and/or fees may reduce earnings on deposit.&nbsp;Rates are variable and subject to change without notice (checking and savings accounts).</p>

Ask us for details.</span></h6></div></div><div id="" class="rate"><h3 id="mortgage" class="" role="heading" aria-level="2">Mortgage Loans<a href="https://www.tcnb.com/loans/personal-loans/home-mortgage-loans.html">Learn More <span style="display: none;" class="ae-compliance-indent ae-reader-visible">about home mortgage loans</span> </a></h3><div id="" class="table split"><p>
    Visit our&nbsp;
    <a href="https://tcnb.mortgagewebcenter.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-aesra-score="linkNewWindowWarning:1;">Mortgage Center<span data-ae-pem-ignore="true" style="display: none;" class="ae-compliance-indent ae-new-window"> Opens a New Window. </span></a>
    for today's mortgage rates.
</p>
<p>
    Tri City National Bank offers other mortgage and home equity loan programs.
    <a href="/loans/personal-loans/meet-our-mortgage-lenders.html">Contact a lender</a>
    to learn more about the programs and today's pricing.

<p><strong>Disclaimer:</strong></p>
<p style="font-size: 10px;">(1)	A minimum deposit of $50.00 is required to open a Passbook and Statement Savings Account, and you must keep a $200.00 minimum available balance to avoid a monthly service charge and earn interest. Rate may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.<br><br>
(2)	A minimum deposit of $15,000.00 is required to open a Home Town Savings Account and earn the published APY. If balance is below $15,000 and above $200 the current regular savings rate will apply. Rate may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.<br><br>
(3)	A minimum deposit of $50.00 is required to open a Home Town Premier Checking account, a minimum collected balance of $500.00 is required to earn interest. Monthly average collected balance of $500.00 or reoccurring direct deposit of payroll, retirement, or social security income is required to avoid $5.00 monthly service fee. Rate may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.<br><br>
(4)	CD Products - Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes principal and interest would remain on deposit for at least one year. The minimum daily balance requirement to open and achieve APY is $500. Interest is accrued daily and credited monthly. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal. Fees may reduce earnings.<br><br>
(5)	Contact Branch to ensure you receive advertised Special Rate on CD. Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes principal and interest would remain on deposit for at least one year. The minimum balance requirement to open and achieve APY is $500. Interest is accrued daily and credited monthly. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal. Fees may reduce earnings.<br><br>
(6)	A minimum deposit of $2,500.00 is required to open a Money Market account. A minimum monthly statement balance of $2,500.00 is required to avoid a monthly service charge of $10.00. Rate may change after account is opened. Monthly service charges or fees could reduce earnings. Interest is calculated using the collected balance and interest earnings are accrued without compounding and deposited monthly.<br><br>
Please note: we reserve the right to alter or withdraw this product or certain features thereof without prior notification. Rates listed are for the branches in the vicinity of the zip code entered.</p>
</div>

	<div id="dnn_ctr19821_HtmlModule_lblContent"><div class="container soft text-center white-text"> <div itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product"> <div class="hproduct" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" typeof="product:Product"> <h2 itemprop="name" class="fn" property="rdfs:label">UFB Direct High-Interest Savings Account</h2> <div class="col-lg-10 col-lg-offset-1"> <p>The <span itemprop="brand" class="brand">UFB Direct</span> <span itemprop="category" class="category">High-Interest Savings</span> Account<sup>1</sup> is a <span itemprop="description" class="description">competitive tiered, variable-rate savings account that offers a multitude of benefits to those who are looking to build their wealth and make the most of their savings dollars</span>. </p> <div class="cta text-center soft"> <a class="btn enrollmentLink1" href="https://ufbdirect.bankenrollment.com">Open Account</a> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div></div>

	<div id="dnn_ctr19824_HtmlModule_lblContent"><div class="container-left same" style="height: 748px;"> <div class="soft"> <div itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BankOrCreditUnion"> <h2>Benefits</h2> <p><strong>Here are some of the benefits that distinguish this <span itemprop="makesOffer">high-interest, high-yield savings account</span>:</strong> </p> <ul> <li>You'll enjoy <span itemprop="makesOffer">free <a itemprop="url" href="/tools/mobile-deposit">Mobile Deposit</a></span>. <span itemprop="makesOffer">You can deposit checks instantly, 24 hours a day, seven days a week, wherever you and your mobile device go</span>.</li> <li><span itemprop="makesOffer">The free <a itemprop="url" href="/tools/mydeposit">MyDeposit</a> banking app allows you to deposit checks instantly                 <a name="top"></a>
<h1>Current Rates - Savings</h1>
  
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Interest accrual begins on the first business day after the day we receive your deposit. Interest is calculated daily based on your available balance, then compounded and credited to your account quarterly (except for the UBM Direct Savings which is monthly). The interest rate is variable, is subject to change without notice and tiered according to your account balance. Fees could reduce earnings.</p>

<table class="basic" style="width:100%" cellspacing="2" cellpadding="0" border="0">

https://www.ultimabank.com/current-rates-cds.htm, #content, <div id="content"><!-- BEGIN CONTENT -->
                <a name="top"></a>
<h1>Current Rates - Certificates of Deposit</h1>
  
<p style="text-align: right;">&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Ultima Bank Minnesota </em></strong>offers a full spectrum of investment products with very competitive rates. Quite often, depending on our loan demand, we offer "Special" rates and terms on our <strong><em>Certificates of Deposit ("CDs")</em></strong> that are exceptionally competitive, as noted below:</p>

<h2>Certificates of Deposit</h2>

<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>Minimum CD Amount $1,000</strong></p>

<p><strong><em>Interest Computation-</em></strong> You will be paid the interest at the stated rate for the term you choose until the maturity date of the certificate. Interest accrual begins on the first business day after the day we receive your deposit then credited to your account at maturity for the 3,6 and 9 month certificates and compounded and credited to your account every six months for the 12 month through 60 month certificates. The annual percentage yield (APY) assumes the interest remains on deposit until maturity and that any withdrawals will reduce earnings.<br>
<strong><em>Balance Computation Method-</em></strong> We use the daily balance method to calculate the interest on your account. This method applies to a daily, periodic rate to the principal in the account each day.<br>
<strong><em>Transaction Limitations- </em></strong>After the account is opened, you may not make deposits into or withdrawals from the account until maturity date.<br>
<strong><em>Early Withdrawal Penalty-</em></strong> If we consent to a request for a withdrawal that is otherwise not permitted, you may have to pay a penalty. The penalty for such withdrawal of any CD with a term to maturity of 12 months or less will be an amount equal to one month of interest. The penalty for early withdrawal of all other CD's will equal three months of interest.<br>
<strong><em>Renewal Policy-</em></strong> This account will be automatically renewed at maturity. You will have a grace period of ten (10) calendar days after the maturity date to withdraw the funds without being charged a penalty.</p>

<p>&nbsp;Rates are accurate as of&nbsp; <script type="text/javascript">
      var d=new Date()
      var weekday=new Array("Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday")
      var monthname=new Array("Jan.","Feb.","Mar.","Apr.","May","June","July","Aug.","Sep.","Oct.","Nov.","Dec.")
      document.write(weekday[d.getDay()] + " ")
      document.write(monthname[d.getMonth()] + " ")
      document.write(d.getDate() + ", ")
      document.write(d.getFullYear())
      </script>Sunday Nov. 25, 2018 .</p>

			<div id="rate-copyright-footer-region" class="row">The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of California. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.</div>
			<div class="row">
				*Federal regulation limits certain types of withdrawals or transfers from your savings or money market account (including online/telephone transfers and Deposit Overdraft Protection transfers) to a maximum of six each monthly statement period (money market accounts) or calendar month (savings accounts or money market accounts when the statement period date was requested on a specific day). Union Bank will charge a $15 Excess Activity Charge for each transfer exceeding the limits. If you exceed these limits, the Bank is required to close your account or convert your account to one not subject to transfer limitations. If your account is closed or converted due to excessive activity, you will not be able to open another Union Bank savings and/or money market account for 12 months from the time the account is closed or converted.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				(1) Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is accurate as of 11/25/2018. Interest rates may change as often as daily without prior notice. Fees may reduce account earnings.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				(2) From time to time, we may offer relationship interest rates for a specified period of time on Regular Savings or MoneyMarket accounts. To receive a relationship interest rate on your Regular Savings or MoneyMarket account, you must request to link to your Priority Banking Checking or Private Advantage checking account. If the Priority Banking or Private Advantage checking account closes or the Priority Banking or Private Advantage relationship ends, the relationship interest rate on your Regular Savings or MoneyMarket account will convert to the standard Regular Savings or MoneyMarket interest rate in effect at that time.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				See our "All About Personal Accounts &amp; Services Disclosure and Agreement", applicable "Personal Accounts Fee Schedule", and applicable "Simply Stated Product Guides" for account details.
			</div>
		</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function getCookie(c_name) {
		var i, x, y, ARRcookies = document.cookie.split(";");
		for (i = 0; i < ARRcookies.length; i++) {
			x = ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
			y = ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
			x = x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
			if (x == c_name) {
				return unescape(y);
			}
		}
	}
	function checkRRCookie() {
		var ubMarketRegion=getCookie("UBMarketRegion");
		if (ubMarketRegion != null && ubMarketRegion != "") {
			var sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of California. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			if (ubMarketRegion == "OR") {
				sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of Oregon. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			}
			if (ubMarketRegion == "WA") {
				sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of Washington. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			}
		}
	  return sHeader;
	}
	document.getElementById("rate-copyright-footer-region").innerHTML = checkRRCookie();
</script>		<div class="shadow-element shadow-box-s "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-sw"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-se"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-e "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-w "></div></div>

			<div id="rate-copyright-footer-region" class="row">The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of California. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.</div>
			<div class="row">
				*Federal regulation limits certain types of withdrawals or transfers from your savings or money market account (including online/telephone transfers and Deposit Overdraft Protection transfers) to a maximum of six each monthly statement period (money market accounts) or calendar month (savings accounts or money market accounts when the statement period date was requested on a specific day). Union Bank will charge a $15 Excess Activity Charge for each transfer exceeding the limits. If you exceed these limits, the Bank is required to close your account or convert your account to one not subject to transfer limitations. If your account is closed or converted due to excessive activity, you will not be able to open another Union Bank savings and/or money market account for 12 months from the time the account is closed or converted.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				(1) Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is accurate as of 11/25/2018. Interest rates may change as often as daily without prior notice. Fees may reduce account earnings.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				(2) From time to time, we may offer relationship interest rates for a specified period of time on Regular Savings or MoneyMarket accounts. To receive a relationship interest rate on your Regular Savings or MoneyMarket account, you must request to link to your Priority Banking Checking or Private Advantage checking account. If the Priority Banking or Private Advantage checking account closes or the Priority Banking or Private Advantage relationship ends, the relationship interest rate on your Regular Savings or MoneyMarket account will convert to the standard Regular Savings or MoneyMarket interest rate in effect at that time.
			</div>
			<div class="row">
				See our "All About Personal Accounts &amp; Services Disclosure and Agreement", applicable "Personal Accounts Fee Schedule", and applicable "Simply Stated Product Guides" for account details.
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function getCookie(c_name) {
		var i, x, y, ARRcookies = document.cookie.split(";");
		for (i = 0; i < ARRcookies.length; i++) {
			x = ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
			y = ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
			x = x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
			if (x == c_name) {
				return unescape(y);
			}
		}
	}
	function checkRRCookie() {
		var ubMarketRegion=getCookie("UBMarketRegion");
		if (ubMarketRegion != null && ubMarketRegion != "") {
			var sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of California. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			if (ubMarketRegion == "OR") {
				sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of Oregon. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			}
			if (ubMarketRegion == "WA") {
				sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts opened in the State of Washington. Accounts opened online are treated as California accounts and are subject to the California Personal Accounts Fee Schedule, regardless of the state of residence. For fees and rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank branch.";
			}
		}
	  return sHeader;
	}
	document.getElementById("rate-copyright-footer-region").innerHTML = checkRRCookie();
</script>		<div class="shadow-element shadow-box-s "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-sw"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-se"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-e "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-w "></div></div>

<div class="itg-rate-copyright-footer"><div class="disclosure-footer"><div class="disclaimer-group"><div id="rate-copyright-footer-region" class="row">The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts in the State of California and opened online. For rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank office.</div>
<div class="row">
See our "All About Time Deposit Accounts Disclosure" and applicable "Fee Schedule" for details.<br><br>
*The interest rate is fixed for the term. Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Rate assume all interest remains on deposit until maturity date; withdrawals may reduce earnings. If you
withdraw all or a portion of the principal prior to the maturity date of the deposit, we may assess an early withdrawal penalty or compensating penalty, whichever is greater. 
</div>
<div class="row">
(1) Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Yield (APY) are accurate as of 11/25/2018. Interest rates may change as often as daily without prior notice. Withdrawals may reduce account earnings. 
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
                function getCookie(c_name)
                {
                                var i,x,y,ARRcookies=document.cookie.split(";");
                                for (i=0;i<ARRcookies.length;i++)
                                {
                                  x=ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
                                  y=ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
                                  x=x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
                                  if (x==c_name)
                                                {
                                                return unescape(y);
                                                }
                                }
                }
                function checkRRCookie()
                {
                  var ubMarketRegion=getCookie("UBMarketRegion");
                  if (ubMarketRegion!=null && ubMarketRegion!="")
                  {
                                var sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts in the State of California and opened online. For rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank office.";
                                if(ubMarketRegion == "OR")
                                {
                                                sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts in the State of California and opened online. For rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank office.";
                                }
                                if(ubMarketRegion == "WA")
                                {
                                                sHeader = "The previous rates are valid for Union Bank personal accounts in the State of California and opened online. For rates in other states, contact a local Union Bank office.";
                                }
                  }
                  return sHeader;
                }
                document.getElementById("rate-copyright-footer-region").innerHTML=checkRRCookie();
</script>			<div class="shadow-element shadow-box-s "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-sw"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-se"></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-e "></div><div class="shadow-element shadow-box-w "></div></div>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p style="font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(102,102,102)"><b>To receive the high Annual Percentage Yield and ATM fee reimbursements nationwide, you must perform the following qualifications each cycle:</b></p><b></b>
<ol>
	<li><b>Have at least 12 Debit Card transactions post and clear your account each qualification cycle.</b></li>
	<li><b>Have at least 1 Direct Deposit or Electronic Automatic Payment post and clear your account each qualification cycle.</b></li>
	<li><b>Enroll and receive Electronic Statements (valid e-mail address required)</b></li>
	<li><b>Access online banking</b></li>
</ol>
<p style="text-align: center">_________________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;<strong>Compounding and crediting&nbsp;</strong>- Dividends will be compounded every month. Dividends will be credited to your account every month.</p>
<p><strong>Dividend period</strong>&nbsp;- For this account type, the dividend period is monthly, for example, the beginning date of the first dividend period of the calendar year is January 1, and the ending date of such dividend period is January 31. All other dividend periods follow this same pattern of dates. The dividend declaration date follows the ending date of a dividend period, and for the example above is January 31.</p>
<p>If you close your account before dividends are paid, you will not receive the accrued dividends.</p>
<p><strong>Minimum balance requirements:<br></strong>The minimum balance required to open this account is $100.00</p>
<p><strong>Daily balance computation method&nbsp;</strong>- Dividends are calculated by the daily balance method which applies a daily periodic rate to the balance in the account each day.</p>
<p><strong>Accrual of dividends on noncash deposits</strong>&nbsp;- Dividends will begin to accrue on the business day you place non-cash items (for example, checks) to your account.</p>
<p><strong>Transaction limitations:</strong><br>
No transaction limitations apply to this account.</p>
<p><strong>Fees and Charges</strong>&nbsp;- No monthly service charge for this account.</p>
<p>ATM fee refunds up to $25 per cycle, $5 per item when qualifications are met.</p></div>
						</div>

<p>*Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is accurate as of the date listed above. Rates may change at any time without prior notice. Simple interest is calculated on the average daily collected balance in the account and credited either monthly or quarterly. Fees could reduce earnings on the account.</p>

<p>**A minimum deposit of $50.00 is required to open each account, except the Minor Savings Account.</p>

                        <h3>Get rewarded for the things you buy</h3>
                        <p>
</p>
<h5>With a Rewards Checking account from United, the stuff you buy every day earns you perks.</h5>
<p>Start earning yours today. Its easy. All you need is $50 and direct deposit to get started!</p>
<h4>Member perks:</h4>
<ul>
    <li>Earn 1 CardPerks Rewards point for every $3 you spend<sup>1</sup></li>
    <li>Get bonus rewards too</li>
    <li>Bonus relationship rewards available</li>
    <li>No monthly fees or minimum balance requirements<sup>2</sup></li>
    <li>Get up to $25.00 per month<sup>3 </sup>back when you get charged for using an ATM</li>
    <li>Keep tabs on your account with <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://usa.visa.com/pay-with-visa/featured-technologies/purchase-alerts.html" target="_blank">Visa Purchase Alerts</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>

    <li>Free personal Financial Planning and Financial Seminars</li>
</ul>

This offer is available for new customers who open a consumer Checking account with United Bank or have a consumer Checking Account with United Bank and increase their deposit relationship by a minimum balance of $10,000 at the time of account opening. Transfers from existing United Bank accounts do not qualify. Limit one promotional rate account per household or business. The promotional rate and tiers will be in effect for 180 days from the date the account is opened after which the standard rates and tiers that apply to the Prime Money Market will be the rates and tiers in effect. The advertised special rates are available exclusively at a United Bank branch. Commercial and Municipal accounts excluded from this offer.<br>
<br>
&amp;Personal accounts only. Beneficiaries are acceptable but they cannot be trust accounts. The advertised Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is effective as of 8/6/2018 and subject to change thereafter. The advertised rates are available exclusively online only. Transfers from existing United Bank accounts do not qualify. Limit one promotional rate account per customer. The minimum to open the Advantage Money Market is $500.00. Fees may reduce earnings. Offer is subject to change without notice and may be withdrawn at any time. Message and data rates may apply. Contact us for further details. Limit one promotional rate account per customer. The promotional rate and tiers will be in effect for 180 days from the date the account is opened after which the standard rates and tiers that apply to the Advantage Money Market will be the rates and tiers in effect. Please refer to your statement, online banking or call us for the standard rates and tiers on our Advantage Money Market account. The variable interest rate that would have been in effect (but for the introductory rate) is currently the same as the promotional rate. This rate is not tied to an index or formula and is determined solely at our discretion and may go down after the introductory promotional period ends.<br>

</script><p><strong>CD and IRA CD Rates</strong>: Withdrawals made before maturity date may be subject to either Regulatory or Bank Imposed penalties. <strong>Regulatory Penalty</strong>: Regulation D penalty is 7 days simple interest on the amount withdrawn and applies to: 1) Withdrawals made within 7 days of opening a time account including the opening day. 2) Withdrawals made within 7 days of any deposits or withdrawals to or from your account, including the transaction day. 3) Withdrawals made within the grace period, when additional deposits are made during the grace period and the withdrawal exceeds the amount of matured CD or IRA CD. <strong>Bank Imposed Penalty</strong>: Withdrawals made other than those described under Regulation D penalty are subject to the early withdrawal fee below: 1) If your account has an original maturity of one year or less, the fee we may impose will equal 90 days interest on the amount withdrawn. 2) If your account has an original maturity of more than one year, the fee we may impose will equal 180 days interest on the amount withdrawn. The APY assumes that the interest remains on deposit until maturity. Interest Rates and APYs for CDs and IRA CDs are fixed for the term of the account. Fees  including early withdrawal penalties - may reduce earnings. Please review your Deposit Account Agreement and Schedule of Fees. </p> 

<p><strong>IRA Savings, Savings, Checking, and HSA Account Rates</strong>: Rates are variable and subject to change without notice. Fees may reduce earnings. Please review your Deposit Account Agreement and Schedule of Fees. </p>

<p><strong>Tiered-Rate Accounts</strong>: Interest is paid on the entire balance within each tier. Fees may reduce earnings. Please review your Deposit Account Agreement and Schedule of Fees.</p>

https://unitedfcu.com/banking/checking/ultra-checking-accounts, div.section:nth-child(9), <div class="section section-centered-column">
    <div class="block-wrap more-padding">
        <div class="block-inner">
            <div class="centered-column text-container">
                <div class="column-row">
                    <div class="column three-fourths">
                        <h3>Earn up to 3.00% APY <sup>1</sup></h3>
                        <p>
Just follow these three easy steps and youre on your way:
</p>
<ul>
    <li>Enroll in eStatements  receive your statements electronically each month</li>
    <li>Have one direct deposit or one electronic payment each month (ACH)</li>
    <li>Swipe and sign for at least ten debit card purchases each month (Credit transactions/Non-PIN based)&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>
DON'T FORGET: A debit card purchase using your PIN will not count as a debit card swipe and sign purchase. All direct deposit, ACH and debit card swipe and sign purchases must post to your account by 6:00 p.m. (ET) on the last business day of the month to count towards that month.
</p>
<h4>Member perks</h4>
<ul>
    <li>Earn up to 3.00% APY (up to $15,000<sup>1</sup>)</li>
    <li>Take advantage of bonus rates on share certificates<sup>2 </sup>(equal to 0.10% APY)</li>
    <li>Enjoy rate discount on new loans<sup>3 </sup>(0.10% APR)</li>
    <li>Get up to $25.00 per month<sup>4 </sup>back when you get charged for using an ATM </li>
    <li>Keep tabs on your account with <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://usa.visa.com/pay-with-visa/featured-technologies/purchase-alerts.html" target="_blank">Visa<sup></sup> Purchase Alerts</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>Great services</h4>
<ul>
    <li>Use Courtesy Pay protection on up to $1,000  for those moments when you dont have enough money in your account (<a href="/banking/checking/courtesy-pay">Click here for Courtesy Pay disclosures</a>)</li>
    <li>Free personal Financial Planning and Financial Seminars</li>
</ul>
<h4>Banking on-the-go</h4>
<ul>
    <li>Online and Mobile banking with Bill Pay and eStatements 24/7</li>
    <li>Free <a href="/online-mobile-voice/mobile-check-deposit">Mobile Check Deposit</a>- Snap a picture of the check with your smartphone</li>
    <li><a href="/online-mobile-voice/u-pay">U Pay</a>- Send money to family and friends from your phone in seconds</li>
    <li><a href="/online-mobile-voice/digital-wallet">Digital Wallet</a>- Google Pay, Apple Pay and Samsung Pay</li>
    <li><a href="/online-mobile-voice/financial-management-tools">Financial Management Tools</a>- Plan, sort, and manage your finances</li>
    <li><a href="/online-mobile-voice/cardswap">CardSwap</a>- Quickly update your payment info all in one place</li>
</ul>

                                        APY earned
                                        on first $15,000 of account balance if monthly requirements not met; balance above $15,000
                                        earns 0.10% APY
                                        and is ineligible for Bonus APY. Monthly requirements for Bonus APY: (a) 10 signature-based
                                        (non-PIN) debit
                                        card transactions posted to account; (b) 1 direct deposit or ACH transaction; and (c) active
                                        enrollment in
                                        e-statements. Rates may change after account is opened. Minimum deposit required to open
                                        account is $50.00.

                        <p>&nbsp;</p>
                        <div class="rate_date small-text" style="text-align: center;">
                            <span style="color: #ff8100;">
                                &nbsp;
                                <strong>
                                    Earn
                                    a bonus rate equal to 0.10% APY on all consumer share certificates with an Ultra Checking with a
                                    positive
                                    balance
                                </strong>&nbsp;

                        <h3>Certificate Special</h3>
                        <table class="ufcu-rate-table cols-3">

                                        above.

                    <div class="page-dscr-text rates-box">
                        <h3>IRA Certificate Special</h3>
                        <table class="ufcu-rate-table cols-3">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <th scope="col" style="text-align: left;"><strong>Type</strong></th>

http://www.unitedfinancialcu.org/rates/, .entry-content, <div class="entry-content" data-userway-font-size="14">
    		<h1 style="text-align: left;" data-userway-font-size="28" align="center">Current Rates</h1>
<p data-userway-font-size="14" align="center"><a href="#savings" data-userway-font-size="14">Savings</a> | <a href="#checking" data-userway-font-size="14">Checking</a> | <a href="#investments" data-userway-font-size="14">Investments</a> | <a href="#loans" data-userway-font-size="14">Loans</a> | <a href="#creditcard" data-userway-font-size="14">Credit Card</a></p>
<p data-userway-font-size="14">Rates are subject to change. Certain rates may vary depending upon the amount invested and the term of the investment. Certain loan rates may vary depending upon the amount borrowed, the term of the loan, and whether the loan is based on a fixed or variable rate.<br data-userway-font-size="14">
<a href="https://www.unitedfinancialcu.org/wp-content/uploads/United-Financial-rate-sheet-10.17.2018.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-userway-font-size="14"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-673 size-full" src="https://www.unitedfinancialcu.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Buttons-rate-sheet.jpg" alt="Buttons---rate-sheet" data-userway-font-size="14" width="265" height="33"></a></p>
<div id="shadebox" data-userway-font-size="14">
<h6 data-userway-font-size="14">Rates listed represent our best rate and are subject to credit approval. Not all members qualify for our best rate. To determine your rate please contact the credit union. Rates and fees subject to change without notice; printed material distributed by United Financial may take priority over Internet rates and/or pages.</h6>
</div>
<h1 data-userway-font-size="28"><a id="savings" name="savings" data-userway-font-size="28"></a>Savings</h1>
<p data-userway-font-size="14"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Rates effective as of October 17, 2018<br data-userway-font-size="14">
<em data-userway-font-size="14">Fees could reduce earnings</em></strong></p>
<table data-userway-font-size="14">
<tbody data-userway-font-size="14">
<tr data-userway-font-size="14">
<td colspan="4" data-userway-font-size="14">
<div data-userway-font-size="14" align="center">
<h1 data-userway-font-size="28">Savings Accounts</h1>
<p data-userway-font-size="14"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Savings Plus, Special Savings, Christmas Club, Vacation Club</strong></p>
</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr data-userway-font-size="14">
<td data-userway-font-size="14" width="510" bgcolor="#f1f1f1"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Dividend Rate</strong></td>
<td colspan="3" data-userway-font-size="14" width="68" bgcolor="#f1f1f1">0.05%</td>
</tr>
<tr data-userway-font-size="14">
<td data-userway-font-size="14"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">APY</strong><em data-userway-font-size="14"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">**  Variable</strong></em></td>
<td colspan="3" data-userway-font-size="14">0.05%</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<table data-userway-font-size="14">
<tbody data-userway-font-size="14">

<td colspan="4" data-userway-font-size="14" height="29" bgcolor="#ffffff">
<div data-userway-font-size="14" align="center"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Grand Account<br data-userway-font-size="14">
</strong>Dividends will post to your Savings Plus Account. Deposits and Withdrawals must be done in increments of $1,000</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr data-userway-font-size="14" bgcolor="#f1f1f1">
<td data-userway-font-size="14" width="511"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Interest Rate</strong></td>
<td colspan="3" data-userway-font-size="14" width="67">0.50%</td>
</tr>

<table data-userway-font-size="14" width="598" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0">
<tbody data-userway-font-size="14">
<tr data-userway-font-size="14">

<h1 data-userway-font-size="28"><a id="loans" name="loans" data-userway-font-size="28"></a>Loans</h1>
<p data-userway-font-size="14"><strong data-userway-font-size="14">Rates effective as of October 17, 2018<br data-userway-font-size="14">
</strong></p>
<table data-userway-font-size="14" width="598" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0">

</td>

  https://www.uniwyo.com/accounts/xtraordinary-checking.htm, #pagecontent, <div id="pagecontent" class="postcontent nobottommargin col_last clearfix editable"><div class="stitched_brown">
<h1>XTRAORDINARY CHECKING</h1>
</div>
<h2>This is no ordinary checking account.</h2>
<p>Xtraordinary Checking is filled with opportunity and convenience. With Xtraordinary Checking you will be earning <strong>2.77% APY*</strong> on all balances up to $15,000! Aside from receiving this fantastic rate youll also be enjoying the safety and convenience of the UniWyo Debit Card and <a href="../e-services/estatements.htm">E-Statements.</a></p>
<p>So how does Xtraordinary Checking work? By using UniWyos <a href="../e-services/estatements.htm">E-Statements</a> you will actually be saving the credit union money that would have been spent on the printing, processing, and mailing of your monthly statement. Additionally, every purchase you make with your debit card creates income, paid to UniWyo by the merchant where you made your purchase. Now, because you are truly an owner of UniWyo, where do you think the money youve saved and earned should go? You saved it, you earned it, its yours!</p>
<p><a class="button button-3d button-rounded button-orange" href="../applications/newaccount.htm"><i class="icon-ok"></i>JOIN UNIWYO</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a class="button button-3d button-rounded button-yellow button-light" href="../rates/index.htm"><i class="icon-signal"></i>CURRENT RATES</a></p>
<h4>&nbsp;</h4>
<h4>Just meet these simple requirements and youre on your way to earning <strong>2.77% APY</strong>:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Sign up for UniWyo <a href="../e-services/estatements.htm">E-Statements </a></li>
<li>Have at least 10 posted debit card transactions per month with an average transaction amount of $5.00 or more</li>
<li>Have at least one monthly <a href="services.htm#dd">direct deposit</a> into your Xtraordinary Checking Account</li>
<li>Have an aggregate deposit/loan balance of $5,000 or more</li>
</ul>
<p>One of the best things about Xtraordinary Checking is you qualify month to month. For example if one month you dont make 10 debit card purchases or dont meet the balance requirement theres always next month!</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="disclosure"><span style="font-size: small;">*The Xtraordinary Rate, 2.77% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is paid on balances up to $15,000 if qualifications are met. No dividend will be paid on balances over $15,000. If qualifications are not met during any given month, no dividend will be paid. Accounts will be reviewed on the last day of each month and qualifications must be met on this day. Dividends will be based on daily balance. No minimum balance is required. Rates subject to change without notice.</span></p>
<!-- InstanceEndEditable -->
<p>&nbsp;</p></div>

							<p class="discContent">Bonus Rate (if present in chart): Until December 14, 2018, in select areas, open a new U.S. Bank Platinum Select Money Market Savings account and receive an <strong>introductory</strong> bonus interest rate (as displayed under bonus rate in table above) of 1.75% for 9 months from the date of account opening. The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is a blended APY based on the 1.75% bonus interest rate for 9 months and the standard interest rate for the remaining 3 months. APY and standard interest rate varies by balance tier and is available in the table above. The introductory bonus interest rate and bonus APY will be applied to balances in your account when you maintain a balance at or above $50,000. At the end of the 9 month period, the introductory bonus interest rate will expire and the interest rate and APY will decrease to the standard variable interest rate and APY in effect at that time. </p>
							<p class="discContent">The introductory bonus interest rate and bonus APY are not valid if you or any signer on the account have an existing U.S. Bank consumer savings or money market account, had a U.S. Bank consumer savings or money market account in the last six months, or received other U.S. Bank bonuses within the past six months.</p>
							<p class="discContent">All regular account opening procedures apply. A minimum deposit to open a U.S. Bank Platinum Select Money Market Savings account is $25. A U.S. Bank Platinum Select Money Market Savings account requires you to maintain an open U.S. Bank Platinum Checking Package with at least one common account holder on each account.  The Platinum Select Money Market Savings account will be converted to a U.S. Bank Standard Savings account if the Platinum Checking Package is closed or transferred to a different non-qualifying product. If another Silver or Gold Checking Package exists, the Platinum Select Money Market Savings account will be converted to a Package Money Market Savings account.</p>

Bonus Rate (if present in chart): Retirement Money Market bonus is available to customers who have a U.S. Bank Silver, Gold, Platinum, or Silver Elite Checking account. To earn the bonus, the customer must also maintain a combined deposit balance requirement of $25,000, which is systematically reviewed. Combined deposit balances include consumer checking, savings, money market, CDs, and IRAs. It may take up to 14 days for the bonus rate to take effect. Checks deposited to Retirement Money Market Savings accounts begin to accrue on the day the deposit is received.</p>

				<div id="package-savings-rates" class="calculatorResults m0 clearfix savingRates" style="display: block;">  
					<a href="/savings/package-money-market.html"><h3 style="display: none;">Package Money Market Savings</h3></a>
					<div class="ratesResults clearfix" style="display: block">
						<div class="ratesTableHolder">
				<table class="ratesResultsTable tabCollapse">
					<thead>
						<tr class="productTitleRow" data-inner-html="
							<th class=&quot;productTitle&quot;>Daily Balance<sup>*</sup></th>
							<th data-info=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;data-cell ratesCol&quot; style=&quot;display: table-cell;&quot;>APY <i class=&quot;icons-info&quot; id=&quot;apr-one-overlay&quot; data-name=&quot;apr-one-overlay&quot; data-lightbox=&quot;yes&quot; data-content=&quot;Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is the effective annual rate of return, taking into account the effect of compounding interest.&quot;></i></th>
							<th class=&quot;data-cell payCol toggle&quot; style=&quot;display: table-cell;&quot;>Interest Rate<span class=&quot;util-float-right&quot;><i class=&quot;icons-tri_up&quot;></i></span></th>
						"><th class="productTitle toggle">Package Money Market Savings<span class="util-float-right"><i class="icons-tri_down"></i></span></th></tr>
					</thead>
					<tbody style="display: none;">
						<tr class="message" style="display: none;"><td colspan="4"></td></tr>
						<tr style="display: none;"><td class="assumptions" colspan="4"></td></tr>
						<tr class="notice" style="display: none;"><td colspan="4"></td></tr>
					<tr class="data-row"><td>Under $1,500</td><td>0.04%</td><td>0.04%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>$1,500 to $9,999</td><td>0.04%</td><td>0.04%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>$10,000 to $49,999</td><td>0.05%</td><td>0.05%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>$50,000 to $99,999</td><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>$100,000 to $499,999</td><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>$500,000 and above</td><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr></tbody>
				</table>
			</div>
						<div class="content-component content-component-flush connected-top" style="display: none;"> 
							<a class="btn btn-primary apply-online" href="https://apply.usbank.com/apply/apply.html?PRODUCT_CODE=SAV&amp;SUB_PRODUCT_CODE=GW&amp;ZipCode=94115">Apply Online</a> 
							<hr>
							<p class="discContent">All regular account opening procedures apply. A minimum deposit to open a U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account is $25. A U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account requires you to maintain an open U.S. Bank Silver or Gold Checking Package with at least one common account holder on each account. The Package Money Market Savings account will be converted to a U.S. Bank Standard Savings account if the Silver or Gold Checking Package is closed or transferred to a different non-qualifying product.</p>
							<p class="discContent">Bonus Rate (if present in chart): Until December 14, 2018, in select areas, open a new U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account and receive an <strong>introductory</strong> bonus interest rate (as displayed under bonus rate in table above) of 0.75% for 6 months from the date of account opening. The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is a blended APY based on the 0.75% bonus interest rate for 6 months and the standard interest rate for the remaining 6 months. APY and standard interest rate varies by balance tier and is available in the table above. The introductory bonus interest rate and bonus APY will be applied to balances in your account when you maintain a balance between $1,500 and $49,999. At the end of the 6 month period, the introductory bonus interest rate will expire and the interest rate and APY will decrease to the standard variable interest rate and APY in effect at that time.</p>
							<p class="discContent">The introductory bonus interest rate and bonus APY are not valid if you or any signer on the account have an existing U.S. Bank consumer savings or money market account, had a U.S. Bank consumer savings or money market account in the last six months, or received other U.S. Bank bonuses within the past six months.</p>
						</div>
					</div> 
				</div>

class="productType">$50,000 to $99,999</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td class="interiorHeading"><b>APY</b> <i class="icons-info" id="apr-two-overlay" data-name="apr-two-overlay" data-lightbox="yes" Rate</b></td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td colspan="2" class="productType">$100,000 to $499,999</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td class="interiorHeading"><b>APY</b> <i class="icons-info" id="apr-two-overlay" data-name="apr-two-overlay" data-lightbox="yes" data-content="Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is the effective annual rate of return, taking into account the effect of compounding interest."></i></td><td class="interiorHeading"><b>Interest Rate</b></td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td colspan="2" class="productType">$500,000 and above</td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td class="interiorHeading"><b>APY</b> <i class="icons-info" id="apr-two-overlay" data-name="apr-two-overlay" data-lightbox="yes" data-content="Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is the effective annual rate of return, taking into account the effect of compounding interest."></i></td><td class="interiorHeading"><b>Interest Rate</b></td></tr><tr class="data-row"><td>0.07%</td><td>0.07%</td></tr></tbody>
				</table>
			</div>
						<div class="content-component content-component-flush connected-top" style="display: none;">
							<a class="btn btn-primary apply-online" href="https://apply.usbank.com/apply/apply.html?PRODUCT_CODE=SAV&amp;SUB_PRODUCT_CODE=&amp;ZipCode=">Apply Online</a>
							<hr>
							<p class="discContent">All regular account opening procedures apply. A minimum deposit to open a U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account is $25. A U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account requires you to maintain an open U.S. Bank Silver or Gold Checking Package with at least one common account holder on each account. The Package Money Market Savings account will be converted to a U.S. Bank Standard Savings account if the Silver or Gold Checking Package is closed or transferred to a different non-qualifying product.</p>
							<p class="discContent">Bonus Rate (if present in chart): For a limited time only, in select areas, open a new U.S. Bank Package Money Market Savings account with an introductory bonus of 0.15% that will be in effect for 12 months from the date the new account is opened. The introductory bonus is added to the standard variable interest rate on the $50,000 - $99,999 and $100,000 - $499,999 balance tiers. At the end of the 12-month period, the introductory bonus will expire and the interest rate and APY will decrease to the standard variable interest rate and APY in effect at that time.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>	
			</div>

<div class="grayText span-18"><ol class="orderedList">
<li>
<p class="push-top-15px append-bottom-10px">Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes principal and interest remain on deposit for the term of the certificate. All interest payments for the APY will be made at the end of the term or annually, whichever occurs first. Penalty will be imposed for early withdrawal. Fees could reduce earning on the account.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p class="append-bottom-10px">$1,000 minimum opening deposit up to a maximum of $249,999.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p class="append-bottom-10px"> Offer good for the initial term only. CD is automatically renewed for the same term. The rate is determined based on the published rate for the CD, excluding CD Specials, that is closest to but not exceeding the term of the CD. Advertised rate and APY are offered at the bank's discretion and may change daily. </p>
</li>
<li>
<p class="append-bottom-10px">Online application is not valid for single maturity CDs, business or retirement CDs, brokerage deposits, institutional investors, public funds or in conjunction with other promotional offers.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p class="append-bottom-10px">FDIC insured to the maximum allowed by law.</p>
</li>
</ol></div>

            }

				<h1>High Yield<br><strong>Online Savings Account</strong></h1>

			<div class="col-xs-12 pb-3">
				
                    <div class="row">
        <div id="featured-product-high-yield-online-savings" class="featured-product col-xs-12 col-md-6">
