				    <div class="content--html">
        <h2>Benefits of a High Yield Online Savings Account:</h2>
<ul>
<li>Flexibility to grow your money and access it when needed</li>
<li>We regularly monitor the competition to ensure our rates are some of the best in the nation<sup>2</sup></li>
<li>Interest is compounded daily, growing your money fast</li>
<li>Your money is FDIC insured up to $250,000<sup>3</sup></li>
<li>Only $100 minimum to open</li>
<li>6 free withdrawals per monthly statement cycle<sup>4</sup></li>
<li>No monthly fee</li>
</ul>
    </div>
<hr class="my-3">    <div class="content--html">
        <h2>About Savings Accounts</h2>
<p><strong>What is an online savings account?</strong> Opting for an online savings account means all of your account services are online and aren't tied to a physical banking branch. Typically these accounts can offer higher returns and are very easy to open online.<br><br><strong>What savings account is best for me?</strong> Generally you'll want to look for a savings account that offers no monthly fees, is FDIC insured to make sure your money is protected, and earns a great interest rate.</p>
    </div>
<hr class="my-3"><div class="row"></div>    <div class="content--html">
        <div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
<div class="col-sm-11">
<h2>Start Saving Today</h2>
<p>Open a new account online in less than five minutes. You'll just need your Social Security number, driver's license and mailing address.</p>
<p class="flex"><a class="btn btn-primary" href="/high-yield-savings#" title="Open a Savings Account" data-oac-id="97173" data-track-name="High Yield Online Savings" style="opacity: 1;">OPEN A SAVINGS ACCOUNT</a></p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
<div class="col-sm-11">
<h2>Want to Talk to a Person?</h2>
<p>You can speak with one of our friendly customer service representatives by calling us at&nbsp;<span class="tel-link"><a href="tel:+18889999170" rel="external" class="tel-link disabled" aria-label="Call 8889999170">888-999-9170</a></span>:</p>
<ul>
<li>Monday - Friday, 7:00am - 9:00pm (CT)</li>
<li>Saturday, 8:00am - 6:00pm (CT)</li>

</ul>
</div>

    <div class="content--html">
        <h2>Benefits of a Vio Bank High Yield Online CD</h2>
<ul>
<li>Earning power of investing your money at a guaranteed rate of return<sup>1</sup></li>
<li>We regularly monitor the competition to ensure our rates are some of the best in the nation<sup>2</sup></li>
<li>Interest is compounded daily, growing your money fast</li>
<li>Your money is FDIC insured up to $250,000<sup>3</sup></li>
<li>Terms ranging from 6 months to 10 years, and only $500 minimum to open</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>About CDs</h2>
<p><strong>What is a CD?</strong> A type of investment that pays at a set rate of interest over a particular time period (term).</p>
<p><strong>What are some uses for CDs?</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Retirement  CDs are ideal for retirement savings because they give you a guaranteed rate of return on your money, so you know exactly what youre getting and when.</li>
<li>Investing  CDs are also great for low maintenance investing. You can use a set it and forget it style of investing without having to monitor them on a regular basis like you might otherwise have to with stocks or other variable investments.</li>
</ul>
    </div>
<hr class="my-3"><div class="row"></div>    <div class="content--html">
        <div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
<div class="col-sm-11">
<h2>Start Saving Today</h2>
<p>Open a new account online in less than five minutes. You'll just need your Social Security number, driver's license and mailing address.</p>
<p class="flex"><a class="btn btn-primary" href="/cds" title="Open a CD Account" style="opacity: 1;">OPEN A CD ACCOUNT</a></p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
<div class="col-sm-11">

<h1>eMoney Market</h1>
<div>
<h2 id="mcetoc_1c0h10do50">2.01% APY Guaranteed for 1 Year*</h2>
<div><br></div>
</div>
<div>
<p>A fixed, 1 year introductory APY is available to clients opening a new VirtualBank eMoney Market account with new money not currently held by VirtualBank. Accounts opened and initially funded with money transferred from an existing VirtualBank account are not eligible for the 1-year introductory period APY.</p>
<p>After the 1-year introductory period, interest rates and APYs will be adjusted to the standard eMoney Market rates in effect. eMoney Market interest rates and APYs are variable, based on account balances, and subject to change daily without notice. Standard eMoney Market rates are disclosed below.</p>
<p><br></p>

<h1>eChecking***</h1>
<div><br></div>
<div class="table-responsive">
<div class="swiper text-center" style="display: none;"> Swipe for More </div><div class="responsive-table" style="overflow-x: hidden;"><table class="table table-striped rates">

</tr>
</thead>

<td>0.25%</td>
</tr>

<td>$2,500 - $9,999.99</td>
<td>0.30%</td>
<td>0.30%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>$10,000 - $24,999.99</td>
<td>0.35%</td>
<td>0.35%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>$25,000 - $49,999.99</td>
<td>0.50%</td>
<td>0.50%</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>$50,000 and up</td>
<td>0.65%</td>
<td>0.65%</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;">
<div><br><br></div>
<span>*APY (Annual Percentage Yield) is accurate as of 3/28/18, and is subject to change. A fixed, 1 year introductory APY is available to clients opening a new VirtualBank eMoney Market account with new money not currently held by VirtualBank. Accounts opened and initially funded with money transferred from an existing VirtualBank account are not eligible for the 1-year introductory period APY. All products and services are subject to approval, including credit approval. After the 1-year introductory period, interest rates and APYs will be adjusted to the standard eMoney Market rates in effect. eMoney Market interest rates and APYs are variable, based on account balances, and subject to change daily without notice. Standard eMoney Market rates are above. Interest will be compounded and credited to your account every month. Under existing federal regulations, you may make a maximum of six preauthorized transfers (including telephone transfers and automatic transfers) from your money market account each month. Federal regulations also require that accounts that continue to violate these limits after being contacted by the Bank, must be permanently converted to an eChecking Account with no ATM/Debit card, or be closed. An excessive withdrawal fee of $15 applies per transaction over six from a VirtualBank money market account. Fees are subject to change and may reduce earnings; please refer to the most current Rate and Fee Schedule for more information</span></span></div>
<div><br></div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;">The interest rates and annual percentage yields (APY) are subject to change daily without notice. Penalty may be imposed for early withdrawal of CDs.</span></div>
<div><br></div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;"><strong>**eCD:</strong> Interest will be compounded daily and added back to principal every quarter (3 months). Fees are subject to change and may reduce earnings; please refer to the most current Rate and Fee Schedule for more information.</span><br></div>
<div><br></div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;"><span><strong>eChecking:</strong> We compound and credit interest earned monthly (at the end of each statement cycle).</span></span></div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;"></span><br></div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;">***We no longer offer the eChecking. We will continue to service the existing eChecking Accounts.</span></div>
<div><br></div>
</div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.75rem;">VirtualBank, a Division of IBERIABANK. Funds from IBERIABANK are not eligible for this promotion.</span></div>

<h2>Welcome Savings<sup>1</sup></h2>
<p>most popular.</p>
</div>

In-person transactions at a branch or by ATM are unlimited. Interest compounded daily.</span></em><em><span class="small"><br></span></em><em><span class="small"><sup>2</sup>&nbsp;$25 minimum deposit required to open your account online</span></em></p>

                  <div class="tab-pane_top">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy30" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <div><span style="color: #706b65; font-family: Oswald; font-size: 1.25rem;">Health Savings Account*</span><br></div>
<div>
<p>medical savings.</p>
</div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy31" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content text-right">
                            <div><span>Please <a href="/about-us/contact-us" data-link-id="/about-us/contact-us" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">contact us</a> or visit your <a href="/locations" data-link-id="/locations" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">local branch</a> for more information or to open a Health Savings Account. &nbsp;</span></div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_bottom bg-light">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy32" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h5>Benefits of opening an HSA:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Tax savings  tax-deductible contributions, tax-deferred earnings, tax-free withdrawals (if used properly)</li>
<li>Flexible  pay for current medical expenses or save for future ones</li>
<li>Funds in the HSA grow tax-free and carry over year after year</li>
<li>The HSA stays with you, regardless of change in coverage or employment</li>
</ul>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy33" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h5>To be eligible for an HSA, you must meet the following requirements:</h5>
<ul>
<li>Be enrolled in a qualified high deductible health plan (HDHP) &nbsp;</li>
<li>Not be covered by another non-HDHP (with limited exceptions)</li>
<li>Not enrolled in Medicare</li>
<li>Not eligible to be claimed as a dependent on another persons tax return</li>
</ul>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_footer">
                    <div class="row">
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-11 col-sm-offset-1">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy34" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <p><em><span class="small">*Because certain restrictions apply, please seek competent tax advice.</span></em></p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy10" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <h3>Direct Checking<sup>1</sup></h3>
<p>Do you use your debit card frequently or use direct deposit? Direct Checking is a straight forward and simple account to help you manage your money.&nbsp;</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy11" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content text-right">
                            <div><a href="https://secure.andera.com/index.cfm?fiid=7A1F496BFAF3439897C54C8349AB640B" data-link-id="" data-link-type-id="url" class="btn btn-primary  external" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Open Account<span class="sr-only"> (Opens in a new Window)</span></a></div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane_bottom bg-light">

                            <ul>
<li>No minimum balance to open in a branch</li>
<li>Free <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Banking</a> with text alerts* and <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Check Deposit</a></li>

                      </div>
                      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy13" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <ul>
<li>A paper statement fee of $2.50 applies to this account.&nbsp; The $2.50 fee will not apply when you enroll in eStatements rather than paper statements.</li>
<li>This account has a monthly maintenance fee of $8. Enjoy this account without paying this monthly maintenance fee with direct deposits totaling $500 or more, or 10 debit card transactions per cycle.&nbsp; Receive a monthly credit of $8 when you do one of the two actions listed above.<br></li>
</ul>

                            <div><a href="https://secure.andera.com/index.cfm?fiid=7A1F496BFAF3439897C54C8349AB640B" data-link-id="" data-link-type-id="url" class="btn btn-primary  external" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Open Account<span class="sr-only"> (Opens in a new Window)</span></a></div>

                      </div>
                    </div>

                        <div data-content-block="bodyCopy37" data-content="content" data-editable="editable" class="content">
                            <ul>
<li>No minimum balance to open this account in a branch or maintain your account</li>
<li>Savings on ATM fees when using non-Tompkins VIST bank ATMs</li>
<li>Free <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Banking</a> with text alerts* and <a href="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-id="/personal-banking/services/mobile" data-link-type-id="page" class="" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">Mobile Check Deposit</a></li>

                        </div>
                      </div>

<li>The account owner must be between 16 and 25</li>
